name: QA Engineer (Middle+)
description:
Netcracker ‚Äî the people designing the future of tech

What‚Äôs the value of working with Netcracker?

  • Your contribution matters. Your expertise drives large-scale business transformations and helps design architectural solutions for millions of telecom customers in Japan, Belgium, the Netherlands, Germany, the UAE, and beyond ‚Äî at the intersection of cutting-edge technologies.
  • An engineering culture that values mentorship and a vibrant expert community. A professional environment where knowledge sharing thrives and depth, rigor, and technical mastery are valued.
  • Career growth in every direction. Switch projects, specialize, and expand your domain, or step into management.
  • Work smarter, not harder. We value outcomes over hours. We trust professionals and support flexibility.
  • Resilience & adaptability. 30+ years globally and 3.5 years in Kazakhstan. We progress even amid global economic challenges.
  • Flexibility & comfort. Modern offices in convenient locations, flexible schedules, and a build-your-own benefits package ‚Äî you choose what matters most.

As a Test Automation Engineer (Middle+) your main tasks will be:

¬∑ Test design and test documentation;
¬∑ Auto tests development;
¬∑ Participation in test tools development;
¬∑ Test data preparation and test execution (manually and by launching auto tests);
¬∑ Analysis of test results.

We are waiting for:
¬∑ Practical experience in cloud solution testing;
¬∑ Hands-on experience in Kubernetes (OpenShift);
¬∑ Hands-on experience with test automation tools such as Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, TestCafe, Appium, etc;
¬∑ Hands-on experience in Postman;
¬∑ Understanding of CI/CD principles;
¬∑ Background in test design and manual testing;
¬∑ Willingness for self-development in test automation area.

We offer:

  • Competitive salary;
  • Medical insurance, covering dental services;
  • More than 300 hard and soft-skills programs by the corporate career development center;
  • Open environment and encouraging knowledge sharing culture;
  • Free English courses and opportunity to practice foreign languages daily;
  • Flexible working hours.

name: NET Trainee
description:
International company Andersen, one of the leaders in the outsource production market, is recruiting for .NET traineeship with further employment in Kazakhstan (in the office: Almaty or Kazakhstan remote).

Andersen Company is interested in the rapid professional development of employees and improvement of their skills, is ready to invest funds and time. Therefore, our competitive advantage is considered to be rapid growth, in terms of salaries, among other things.

Requirements:

  • Intermediate or higher level of English (verbal communication);
  • understanding of the principles of OOP, SOLID, good knowledge of basic C# syntax, .NET platform and understanding of relational databases (MS SQL);
  • ASP.NET Core, WebAPI, ORM (Entity Framework) theoretical knowledge and experience in using;
  • algorithms and data structures understanding;
  • will be a plus: theoretical knowledge of CSS, JavaScript, experience in using Angular;
  • will be a plus: Intermediate or higher level of German.

Conditions:

  • practice on a training project under the guidance of experienced tutors;
  • control of the trainee's knowledge mastery and feedback;
  • office-based or remote format of training;
  • corporate English language courses at the office or online;
  • access to the corporate internal training programme (own educational platform);
  • participation in the company's vibrant corporate life.

An Andersen trainee can confidently count on:

  • high professionalism of mentors;
  • careful and attentive attitude during training;
  • assistance and support during the training process and when entering a commercial project afterwards;
  • guaranteed employment upon successful completion of training.

Andersen is a great opportunity to start and grow in IT!

name: Senior Front-end Developer
description:
Our company, with over 12 years of experience in IT commercial development, collaborates with major customers across Europe. We are seeking a passionate and experienced Senior Front-end Developer to join our dynamic team. This role offers the opportunity to work on innovative applications in areas such as industrial monitoring and analytics, satellite and drone image processing, power grid optimization, and leak detection in pipelines.

About the Platform

You will be contributing to the ongoing development and evolution of a next-generation industrial data visualization platform created by a leading global technology company. This long-term initiative supports continuous innovation in how high-frequency sensor data from industrial assets‚Äîsuch as gas turbines‚Äîis monitored, analyzed, and visualized in real time.

Unlike traditional BI tools, this solution is purpose-built for live visualization of big data, offering secure, browser-based access to personalized dashboards and diagnostics tools. It is actively used across multiple international locations and supports applications in testing, engineering, service, and security.

The development team is internationally distributed, bringing together experts in software engineering and data analytics in a collaborative, cross-cultural environment.

Key capabilities of the platform include:

  • Data-as-a-Service and Analytics-as-a-Service delivery.

  • Modular architecture with plug-in APIs for rapid integration and customization.

  • Real-time diagnostics, stream analytics, and visual components integrated directly into operational workflows.

  • Multi-tenant architecture, cloud-based scalability, and support for edge deployments enable localized data processing and visualization close to the source.

  • A rich, configurable user interface supporting industrial plant layouts and interactive charts.

In addition to its core capabilities, the platform is also being enhanced with AI-powered features, including the use of generative AI and large language models (LLMs) to support advanced analysis of multi-modal data, further expanding its potential across industrial domains.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Development of front-end and client-server communication layers

  • Contribution to solution architectures and requirements elicitation

  • Participation in development processes improvement

  • Design and develop top-tier web applications using React.js and TypeScript

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create highly efficient and responsive web interfaces

  • Optimize and refactor existing code for improved performance and scalability

  • Ensure seamless integration with backend services through REST APIs

  • Establish best practices and provide code reviews

Expertise & competencies requirements:

  • Commercial software development experience with JavaScript/TypeScript (5+ years)

  • Significant experience with React and popular state managers (Redux, MobX, Reatom etc.)

  • Proficiency with HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Less

  • Deep knowledge of Git

  • Experience with design, prototyping, debugging

  • Problem-solving attitude with a will to deliver the best possible user experience

  • Communication skills and readiness to work in a team as well as individually

  • Familiar with frontend build tools and module bundlers like Webpack

  • Experience with API integration and asynchronous programming

  • Knowledge of frontend testing frameworks and implementing unit and integration tests

  • Ability to resolve cross-browser and responsive design challenges efficiently

  • Proficiency in English (spoken and written)

Would be beneficial:

  • Experience with visualization libraries (d3.js, Ant Design, ECharts, MUI or similar)

  • Practical knowledge of Angular (optional)

  • Contribution to journals/blogs/professional community resources

  • Experience in implementation of other communication protocols like gRPC and WebSockets

  • Experience in configuring GitLab CI

Working conditions:

  • Working time Mo-Fr (8 working hours)

  • Employment according labor law of Republic of Kazakhstan

  • Compensation of medical insurance after trial period

  • Remote work with international team

  • Growth possibilities

name: Full Stack QA Automation Engineer (Java)
description:
Andersen is hiring a Full Stack QA Automation Engineer to support and improve card products for a modern digital bank, enhancing functionality, performance, and overall user experience.

The customer is a modern financial institution providing a full range of banking services for individuals and businesses, including payments, transfers, loans, deposits, and digital banking. The organization focuses on innovation and accessibility and has been recognized for its contributions to the development of digital financial services.

The project is focused on leading the development of card products, including implementing new features and improving existing functionality. The team works to enhance product performance, reliability, and user experience while ensuring continuous support and maintenance.

Responsibilities:

  • Developing and maintaining automated tests for backend services (API, integrations, microservices).
  • Performing manual, load, regression, and smoke testing.
  • Preparing test documentation: test cases, checklists, bug reports.
  • Collaborating with developers and analysts to clarify requirements and testing scenarios.
  • Configuring and optimizing CI/CD processes from a testing perspective.
  • Analyzing logs, monitoring systems, and identifying root causes of defects at the API and service level.
  • Ensuring release quality and participating in release validation activities.

Must-have:

  • Experience as an QA Automation Engineer (Java) for 3+ years.
  • Experience in manual testing.
  • Deep understanding of backend testing and microservices architecture.
  • Experience working with CI/CD pipelines (GitLab CI or similar).
  • Knowledge of SQL and ability to verify data correctness in databases.
  • Understanding of API testing principles, JSON/XML formats, and HTTP requests.
  • Experience working in an Agile team and using Jira, Confluence, and Git.
  • High sense of responsibility and attention to detail.
  • Ability to think systematically and analyze complex scenarios.
  • Readiness for high-intensity project work and autonomy in task execution.
  • Level of English ‚Äì from Intermediate and above.

Nice-to-Haves:

  • Experience testing systems that use Kafka, RabbitMQ, or other message brokers.
  • Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes.
  • Experience working with monitoring systems (Grafana, ELK).
  • Experience performing load testing (JMeter, Gatling, or similar tools).
  • Experience in the banking or fintech domain.

Reasons why this job would be interesting to you:

  • Experience in teamwork with leaders in FinTech, Healthcare, Retail, Telecom, and others. Andersen cooperates with such businesses as Samsung, Siemens, Johnson & Johnson, BNP Paribas, Ryanair, Mercedes, TUI, Verivox, Allianz, T-Systems, etc..
  • The opportunity to change the project and/or develop expertise in an interesting business domain.
  • Job conditions ‚Äì you can work both fully remotely and from the office or can choose a hybrid variant.
  • Guarantee of professional, financial, and career growth! The company has introduced systems of mentoring and adaptation for each new employee.
  • The opportunity to earn an additional up to 1,000 USD per month by participating in the company's activities.
  • Access to the corporate training portal, where the entire knowledge base of the company is collected and which is constantly updated.
  • Bright corporate life (parties / pizza days / PlayStation / fruits / coffee / snacks / movies).
  • Certification compensation (AWS, PMP, etc).
  • Referral program.
  • English courses.
  • Private health insurance and compensation for sports activities.

Join us!

name: JavaScript Trainee
description:
International company Andersen, one of the leaders in the outsource production market, is recruiting for JavaScript traineeship with further employment in Kazakhstan (in the office: Almaty or Kazakhstan remote).

Andersen Company is interested in the rapid professional development of employees and improvement of their skills, is ready to invest funds and time. Therefore, our competitive advantage is considered to be rapid growth, in terms of salaries, among other things.

Requirements:

  • Intermediate or higher level of English (verbal communication);
  • strong theoretical knowledge of JavaScript, HTML/CSS basics, skills in working with programming environments;
  • knowledge of data types, ability to work with arrays and objects, understanding prototypes and how to work with them, understanding what AJAX is;
  • training/pet-projects in the portfolio;
  • dealing with Git;
  • will be a plus: Intermediate or higher level of German.

If you are interested in our free online intensive ‚ÄúAngular Intensive‚Äù, please indicate ‚ÄúIntensive‚Äù in the response.

Requirements for free online intensive:

  • English level: Intermediate or higher (verbal communication);
  • strong theoretical knowledge of JavaScript, HTML/CSS basics.

Conditions:

  • theoretical training: group intensive;
  • practice on a training project under the guidance of experienced tutors;
  • control of the trainee's knowledge mastery and feedback;
  • office-based or remote format of training;
  • corporate English language courses at the office or online;
  • access to the corporate internal training programme (own educational platform);
  • participation in the company's vibrant corporate life.

An Andersen trainee can confidently count on:

  • high professionalism of mentors;
  • careful and attentive attitude during training;
  • assistance and support during the training process and when entering a commercial project afterwards;
  • guaranteed employment upon successful completion of training.

Andersen is a great opportunity to start and grow in IT!
key_skills: JavaScript, HTML, HTML5, Git, CSS3, CSS, Ajax, Angular, AngularJS

  • CRM System Development ‚Äî development of a number of services to ensure a high level of customer service, effective engagement of new customers and retention of existing ones.
  • Big Data ‚Äî development of complex systems for processing and analysis of big data.
  • Cloud Services ‚Äî we use cloud technologies for scaling and business efficiency.

Requirements:

  • 2+ year of experience in software testing;
  • Understanding of QA principles, testing methodologies, and SDLC;
  • Experience working in Agile teams (Scrum or Kanban);
  • Experience performing functional testing (smoke, regression, integration, UAT);
  • Experience creating and maintaining test documentation (test cases, checklists, simple test reports);
  • Experience in web testing (frontend and backend);
  • Strong attention to details and analytical thinking;
  • Willingness to learn new technologies, automation tools, and improve QA skills;
  • Proactive mindset and readiness to take ownership of assigned tasks.

Nice to have:

  • Familiarity with API testing in Postman;
  • Experience in mobile applications testing (iOS, Android);
  • Basic knowledge of Git and code editors;
  • Familiarity with test management tools (e.g., Zephyr, TestRail, or similar);
  • Experience working with logs (Kibana or browser console);
  • Understanding of automation concepts or basic experience with TypeScript + Playwright.

Responsibilities:

  • Familiarization with the team, product, and processes;
  • Opportunity to work independently with simple tasks; Follow delivery objectives and tasks, delivery process;
  • Participate in planning & estimation sessions;
  • Perform test design and test execution activities.

name: Automated Testing in Java Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in Java training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in Java and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of Java programming (Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Arrays, Classes)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials

  • Technology mentors from around the globe

  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs

  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience

  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Java Trainee
description:
International company Andersen, one of the leaders in the outsource production market, is recruiting for Java traineeship with further employment in Kazakhstan (in the office: Almaty or Kazakhstan remote).

Andersen Company is interested in the rapid professional development of employees and improvement of their skills, is ready to invest funds and time. Therefore, our competitive advantage is considered to be rapid growth, in terms of salaries, among other things.

Requirements:

  • Intermediate or higher level of English (verbal communication);
  • Intermediate or higher level of German (verbal communication);
  • OOP principles understanding, algorithms and data structures knowledge, Java Core;
  • knowledge of relational databases (Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.);
  • experience in unit tests writing, knowledge of version control systems (git or svn), Spring Framework, and ORM (Hibernate Framework);
  • will be a plus: knowledge of the basics of Java EE (Servlets, jsp).

Conditions:

  • theoretical training;
  • practice on a training project under the guidance of experienced tutors;
  • control of the trainee's knowledge mastery and feedback;
  • office-based or remote format of training;
  • corporate English language courses at the office or online;
  • access to the corporate internal training programme (own educational platform);
  • participation in the company's vibrant corporate life.

An Andersen trainee can confidently count on:

  • high professionalism of mentors;
  • careful and attentive attitude during training;
  • assistance and support during the training process and when entering a commercial project afterwards;
  • guaranteed employment upon successful completion of training.

Andersen is a great opportunity to start and grow in IT!

name: Frontend Developer Vue, JavaScript/TypeScript
description:
Hi there!

At Plumsail, we develop online services that help automate business processes. Over 8,000 companies in 170 countries rely on our products, including Fortune 500 companies, as well as leading educational, government, and non-profit organizations.


We are growing and looking for a developer to join our team! If you love building great products and working with modern technologies, this might be the right fit for you.

What we're looking for

  • Solid understanding of modern web technologies

  • Strong skills in JavaScript (TypeScript)

  • Experience with at least one popular JavaScript framework (React, Vue, or Angular) and willingness to learn others

  • Hands-on experience with HTML, CSS (SCSS)

  • Backend experience with C# / .NET is a plus

  • Comfortable asking for advice when needed and happy to share knowledge with others

  • Written communication skills in English are a plus

What you'll be doing

  • Developing new features using JavaScript (TypeScript), Vue/React, HTML, and CSS (SCSS)

  • Exploring and implementing modern technologies to improve our products

  • Maintaining and improving existing products

  • Contributing to best practices and sharing knowledge within the team

  • Occasionally working with backend components

What we offer

  • Work on a highly demanded product with diverse and interesting tasks;
  • Competitive salary, official contract;
  • Remote work and flexible schedule without overtime;
  • Annual bonus to compensate expenses for education, fitness, medical services, etc.
  • Assistance in setting up your workspace (computer, furniture, etc.);
  • Lack of bureaucracy, dress code, and other formalities;
  • Confidence that you will be rewarded if you grow and show outstanding results.

Bonuses

We allocate an annual stipend for each employee. You can spend your stipend for:

  • Self-education. Take online or offline classes, participate in conferences, buy books, etc.
  • Fitness. Pay for a gym membership, yoga, or any activity that helps you stay in shape.

  • Wellness. Use the stipend to pay for a service or experience that enhances your overall mental well-being. For some people, that might mean a monthly massage. Feel free to book a service at a spa or any other relaxing experience.

  • Medical services. Utilize the stipend to cover any necessary medical services. As the saying goes, a sound body makes a sound mind.

  • Coworking. Pay for coworking space. Just make sure you're using a real coworking space that's meant solely for working, not a club or social space.

  • Home office set up. Furnish your home office and improve your PC.

----

name: CRM Administrator
description:
About the Position:

KT&G Global Kazakhstan is looking for a System Administrator to join our IT Team in Almaty, Kazakhstan.

What You‚Äôll Do:

  • MS365/Azure Management: Managing and optimizing Microsoft 365 and Azure cloud services, including virtual machines, storage, networking, and security.
  • CRM Management: Administering and maintaining CRM systems (e.g., Microsoft Dynamics 365), ensuring data integrity, customizing workflows, and integrating with other business applications.
  • Hardware Device Management: Overseeing the installation, configuration, and maintenance of system hardware, including servers, storage devices, and network equipment.
  • Automation (Power Apps, Power Automate): Developing and implementing automation solutions using Microsoft Power Apps and Power Automate to streamline business processes and improve efficiency.

We're Looking For:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.
  • 3‚Äì5 years of relevant experience.
  • Hands-on expertise with Microsoft Azure and MS365.
  • Strong knowledge of CRM systems (e.g., Dynamics 365, Optima).
  • Experience in hardware and network management
  • Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

name: Automated Testing in Java Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in Java training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in Java and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of Java programming (Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Arrays, Classes)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials

  • Technology mentors from around the globe

  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs

  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience

  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Automated Testing in .NET Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in .NET training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in –°# and the .NET platform, as well as master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~ 2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of C# programming (Integers, Static Methods, Boolean and Logical Operators, Conditional Statements, Real Numbers, Exceptions, Iteration Statements)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Automated Testing in .NET Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in .NET training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in –°# and the .NET platform, as well as master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~ 2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of C# programming (Integers, Static Methods, Boolean and Logical Operators, Conditional Statements, Real Numbers, Exceptions, Iteration Statements)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Elixir Senior Developer
description:
We're looking for a professional to join our team and help us build high-performing, distributed systems with real product impact.

Requirements:

  • 4+ years of software engineering experience with a minimum of 2+ years of professional experience working with Elixir
  • Experience with test-driven development
  • Extensive experience integrating external APIs
  • Deep understanding of distributed systems principles
  • Experience working with microservices and/or service-oriented architecture
  • Experience creating and maintaining CI/CD pipelines
  • Good understanding of Kubernetes from a software engineering perspective
  • Experience working with public cloud providers (GCP is preferred)
  • Good understanding of relational and non-relational database principles
  • Hands-on experience in designing robust REST APIs
  • Fluent English, both verbal and written
  • Basic knowledge of Ruby

We can offer:

  • Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
  • Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
  • Career development system with clear skill qualifications
  • Flexible working hours aligned to your schedule
  • Options to work remotely
  • Compensation of medical costs
  • English courses online
  • Corporate parties and events for employees and their children
  • Gym membership compensation, corporate sport competitions (cybersport included)
  • 5 days of paid sick leave per year with no obligation to submit a sick-leave certificate
key_skills: Elixir, APIs, CI/CD, Kubernetes, GCP (Good Clinical Practice), Ruby

name: Ruby on Rails Middle Developer
description:
We are looking for experienced developers that are willing to solve complex technical issues while developing high quality software systems using modern technologies.

What we expect from you:

  • 1+ years of experience in IT;
  • experience in Ruby on Rails development;
  • experience with databases (SQL or NoSQL);
  • English language level should be sufficient for written communication.

It would be a plus to have:

  • experience in Frontend development (HTML 5, JavaScript / TypeScript, Angular / React or other);
  • experience with automated testing;
  • knowledge of containerization principles, hands-on experience with Docker.

We can offer:

  • Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
  • Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
  • Career development system with clear skill qualifications
  • Flexible working hours aligned to your schedule
  • Options to work remotely
  • Corporate medical insurance covering services of private and public medical centers
  • English courses online
  • Corporate parties and events for employees and their children
  • Gym membership compensation, corporate sport competitions (cybersport included)
  • 5 days of paid sick leave per year with no obligation to submit a sick-leave certificate
key_skills: JavaScript, Ruby On Rails, HTML, SQL, MS SQL

name: MATLAB Developer
description:
Andersen, an international IT company, invites a MATLAB Developer to support a global insurance provider in building a unified B2B2C portal, enhancing client experience through optimized digital workflows and smart use of existing assets.

The customer is a world leader in insurance and B2B2C support, which offers global solutions that span international health and life insurance, travel insurance, cars, and their service. The company is dedicated to delivering world-class, agile, and sustainable IT solutions, driving full-spectrum digitalization.

The project is the development of a portal that can deliver a unified client‚Äôs experience for B2B2C interactions. The primary goal is to cater to client needs by leveraging existing assets and providing digital solutions when necessary.

Responsibilities:

  • Analyzing existing MATLAB source code of GM and RMT modules.
  • Producing software documentation (User Manual Templates, Input/Output maps, structure diagrams, etc.).
  • Producing technical documentation describing the engineering logic and mathematical algorithms.
  • Participating in knowledge transfer sessions and code reviews with Client experts.
  • Developing new MATLAB classes:‚ÄúBall Bearings‚Äù class integrated into the Brg superclass and ‚ÄúLiquid Seal Ring‚Äù class following the ‚Äúlaby‚Äù structure.
  • Modifying JSON input functions to feed new class instances.
  • Ensuring functional validation using test cases provided by the Client.
  • Committing all code to the GitHub repository following version control best practices.

Must-haves:

  • Experience in software development and analysis using MATLAB / Simulink for 3+ years.
  • Advanced MATLAB skills, including scripting, functions, classes, and toolboxes.
  • Knowledge of Simulink (optional but beneficial).
  • Experience with JSON handling and file I/O operations in MATLAB.
  • Basic knowledge of Python or C/C++ (for understanding integration layers ‚Äî optional).
  • Strong background in engineering mathematics, physics, or mechanical engineering (preferably turbomachinery, rotating equipment, or fluid dynamics).
  • Proven experience in code analysis, refactoring, and documentation of legacy MATLAB projects. Familiarity with object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts in MATLAB.
  • Experience with data structures, JSON input/output parsing, and function integration.
  • Good understanding of numerical methods and algorithmic modeling (e.g., solving systems of equations, signal or thermal analysis, performance modeling).
  • Hands-on experience with Git/GitHub for code versioning and collaboration.
  • Understanding of engineering domains relevant to the project, including: Bearings (Ball Bearings, Liquid Seal Rings, Labyrinth Seals); Rotordynamics, mechanical connections, and fluid-structure interactions.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving mindset.
  • Ability to work with complex mathematical and physical models.
  • Clear technical writing for documentation purposes.
  • Proactive communication and collaboration in cross-functional technical discussions (English working proficiency required).
  • Level of English ‚Äì from Intermediate+ and above.

Reasons why this job would be interesting to you:

  • Experience in teamwork with leaders in FinTech, Healthcare, Retail, Telecom, and others. Andersen cooperates with such businesses as Samsung, Siemens, Johnson & Johnson, BNP Paribas, Ryanair, Mercedes, TUI, Verivox, Allianz, T-Systems, etc..
  • The opportunity to change the project and/or develop expertise in an interesting business domain.
  • Job conditions ‚Äì you can work both fully remotely and from the office or can choose a hybrid variant.
  • Guarantee of professional, financial, and career growth! The company has introduced systems of mentoring and adaptation for each new employee.
  • The opportunity to earn up to an additional 1,000 USD per month, depending on the level of expertise, which will be included in the annual bonus, by participating in the company's activities.
  • Access to the corporate training portal, where the entire knowledge base of the company is collected and which is constantly updated.
  • Bright corporate life (parties / pizza days / PlayStation / fruits / coffee / snacks / movies).
  • Certification compensation (AWS, PMP, etc).
  • Referral program.
  • English courses.
  • Private health insurance and compensation for sports activities.

Join us!

name: Lead Fullstack Engineer (Marketing)
description:
Sumsub is the one verification platform to secure the whole user journey. With Sumsub‚Äôs customizable KYC, KYB, transaction monitoring and fraud prevention solutions, you can orchestrate your verification process, welcome more customers worldwide, meet compliance requirements, reduce costs and protect your business.

With over 4,000 clients across fintech, crypto, transportation, trading, e-commerce, education, and iGaming‚Äîincluding Bitpanda, Wirex, Avis, Bybit, Vodafone, Duolingo, Kaizen Gaming, and TransferGo.

We‚Äôre looking for an experienced Web Development Team Lead to join our Growth Marketing team. Our main platform is built with Next.js, and we want someone who can combine strong technical expertise with leadership skills to deliver high-impact web experiences that fuel our growth.

This role is perfect for a developer who loves building fast, user-focused websites, enjoys working closely with marketers and designers, and is ready to lead a small but powerful team.

What You Will Be Doing:

  • Lead and mentor a team of 3 web developers, ensuring best practices, clean code, and technical growth.
  • Own the development and maintenance of our Next.js website, focusing on speed, scalability, and reliability.
  • Partner with designers, marketers, and product managers to launch user-focused features, campaigns, and experiments.
  • Oversee smooth deployment processes and collaborate with DevOps/backend teams when needed.
  • Keep an eye on modern frontend trends and push for improvements in performance, design, and user experience.

About You:

  • Strong experience in frontend development, with deep expertise in React/Next.js. Familiarity with Astro, Redis will be a plus.
  • Experience working in growth-focused or marketing tech environments.
  • Solid understanding of modern web technologies, performance optimization, and SEO principles.
  • Proven ability to implement animations, interactive experiences, and creative layouts.
  • Hands-on experience with DevOps tools and practices (CI/CD, APIs, cloud hosting, etc.).
  • Architectural leadership: ability to bring clarity to system design and development processes.
  • Previous experience as a team lead or senior developer role handling mentoring and code reviews.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills, comfortable working cross-functionally with various stakeholders within Marketing and beyond.
  • Proactive mindset with a passion for growth, experimentation, and delivering real impact.

What We Offer:

  • Competitive compensation in compliance with your professional expertise.
  • Working with a product that matters. Our technology helps to protect millions of users and lots of online services worldwide.
  • International project. Our team works from offices in Berlin, Limassol, London, and Miami, our customers are spread from Mexico and the USA to Hong Kong, South Korea, and Singapore.
  • Remote first company ‚Äì work from anywhere in the world.
  • Paid vacation and sick leave.

The hiring stages: TA screening -> Hiring manager interview -> Final interview.

Sounds like a great opportunity for your career development? Then go ahead and apply!


We are a global community of innovators, creators, and thinkers, and we believe that diversity fuels our innovation. Sumsub is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. We welcome applications from people of all backgrounds, cultures, genders, experiences, abilities and perspectives. Join us in shaping the future inclusively.

name: Senior IT Automation Engineer
description:
Responsibilities

  • Development and implementation of internal services that automate key processes
  • Designing and improving the architecture of existing applications, selecting optimal technologies
  • Full development cycle: from requirements generation to release
  • Conducting code reviews, mentoring and developing the development team CI/CD setup and support, optimisation of testing and release processes
  • Preparation and updating of technical documentation, presentation of solutions for internal stakeholders

Qualifications

  • 5+ years of experience in software development (Go, Python or other modern languages)
  • Strong command of CI/CD tools, understanding of DevOps approach
  • Excellent communication skills, ability to lead and mentor a team
  • Willingness to make responsible decisions in a highly autonomous environment

  • Deep skills in debugging, code review, SQL & Data Modeling and application architecture

    Would be a plus:

  • Experience in microservice architecture design and containerisation (Docker/Kubernetes)
  • Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
  • Experience with Kafka Certifications in modern technology and system design

Conditions & Benefits

  • Stable salary, official employment
  • Health insurance
  • Hybrid work mode and flexile schedule
  • Relocation package offered for candidates from other regions
  • Access to professional counseling services including psychological, financial, and legal support
  • Discount club membership
  • Diverse internal training programs
  • Partially or fully payed additional training courses
  • All necessary work equipment

name: Automated Testing in Java Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in Java training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in Java and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of Java programming (Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Arrays, Classes)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials

  • Technology mentors from around the globe

  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs

  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience

  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Lead AI Engineer
description:
We are looking for a Lead AI Engineer to design and deliver AI solutions, including chatbots, Q&A systems, and workflow systems for agents.

This position requires staying informed about LLM advancements and driving innovation in AI projects. Join us to expand your expertise in AI engineering and create impactful solutions tailored to client needs.

This position offers remote setup with the flexibility to work from any location in Kazakhstan, whether it's your home or well-equipped offices in Astana, Almaty or Karaganda.

Responsibilities

  • Design AI applications such as chatbots, Q&A platforms, and agent workflows
  • Collaborate with clients to identify needs, opportunities, and recommend LLM-based solutions
  • Develop data pipelines, prompt strategies, and datasets to support effective AI models
  • Evaluate AI systems to ensure accuracy, security, scalability, and compliance with industry standards
  • Research and validate technical feasibility while demonstrating business value
  • Stay informed about LLM technologies, frameworks, and methodologies to improve solutions

Requirements

  • Proficiency in Python and experience with web frameworks like FastAPI
  • Background in leading and mentoring engineering teams
  • Understanding of AI development lifecycles
  • Flexibility to use rapid UI prototyping tools like Streamlit or Gradio
  • Familiarity with LLM platforms and APIs such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Amazon Bedrock, and Gemini, along with frameworks like LangGraph and LlamaIndex
  • Knowledge of advanced AI integration patterns like RAG and Agents
  • Skills in deploying AI solutions at scale with a focus on performance and cost-efficiency
  • Experience assessing generative AI quality using retrieval, classification, or LLM-based metrics
  • Proven background in AI engineering and delivering machine learning-based solutions
  • Competency in problem-solving with strong attention to detail
  • Strong written and verbal English communication skills (B2+)

Nice to have

  • Background in designing experiments and conducting A/B testing for model optimization
  • Understanding of retrieval systems, vector search, and ranking algorithms
  • Familiarity with protocols like MCP, A2A, and ACP
  • Experience deploying AI solutions to cloud platforms such as Azure OpenAI, Amazon Bedrock, or GCP Vertex AI; flexibility to leverage on-premise options like vLLM
  • Background in enterprise AI platforms such as AWS AgentCore, Databricks AgentBricks, or Azure AI Foundry
  • Skills in using observability and monitoring frameworks and tools

We offer

  • We connect like-minded people: :
    • Delivering innovative solutions to industry leaders, making a global impact
    • Enjoyable working environment, whether it is the vibrant office or the comfort of your own home
    • Opportunity to work abroad for up to two months per year
    • Relocation opportunities within our offices in 55+ countries
    • Corporate and social events
  • We invest in your growth:‚ÄØ :
    • Leadership development, career advising, soft skills and well-being programs
    • Certifications, including GCP, Azure and AWS
    • Unlimited access to LinkedIn Learning and Get Abstract
    • Free English classes with certified teachers
    • Discounts in local language schools, including online courses for the Kazakh language
  • We cover it all: :
    • Participation in the Employee Stock Purchase Plan
    • Monetary bonuses for engaging in the referral program
    • Medical & family care package
    • Six trust days per year (sick leave without a medical certificate)
    • Coverage of psychology sessions of your choice
    • Benefits package (sports activities, a variety of stores and services)

EPAM is a team of technologists and innovators united by a passion for technology. In Kazakhstan, we operate across all cities with offices in Astana, Almaty, and Karaganda and work with the world's leading companies from different industries. In 2023, EPAM received the Export Excellence Award at the esteemed Digital Bridge Awards, showcasing our commitment to excellence and innovation.

name: Frontend Developer (React)
description:
Andersen, an international IT —Åompany, invites a Frontend Developer (React) to work on large-scale projects.

Andersen is a pre-IPO global software development company with over 18 years of experience delivering full-cycle IT services. We specialize in helping enterprises and fast-growing mid-sized businesses accelerate their digital transformation through modern, scalable, and secure software solutions.

Our company operates across a global network of 18 development centers and offices, strategically located in North America, Western and Central Europe, the Middle East, and the Asia-Pacific region. With a strong team of over 3,500 highly skilled professionals, we combine deep domain expertise and advanced technical capabilities to consistently deliver exceptional results for our clients.

Responsibilities:

  • Working with clients to develop the overall look and design of a website.
  • Writing website code with programming languages such as HTML and JS.
  • Producing, maintaining, and modifying websites and user interfaces.
  • Incorporating applications, graphics, audio and video clips into client websites.
  • Creating tools that enhance the user‚Äôs website experience.
  • Ensuring websites are accessible across many platforms, including laptops and smartphones.
  • Routinely testing websites for ease of use, speed and other quality factors.
  • Fixing any website issues or bugs that arise.

Must-haves:

  • Experience in professional front-end development, with a focus on React for 3+ years.
  • Strong understanding of React and its core principles, such as JSX, components, state, and props.
  • Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript language, including its syntax and features.
  • Experience with popular React workflows (such as Redux or MobX).
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs and modern front-end build pipelines and tools.
  • Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript libraries like jQuery.
  • Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Good communication skills and ability to work in a team environment.
  • Level of English ‚Äì from Intermediate+ and above.

Reasons why this job would be interesting to you:

  • Experience in teamwork with leaders in FinTech, Healthcare, Retail, Telecom, and others. Andersen cooperates with such businesses as Samsung, Siemens, Johnson & Johnson, BNP Paribas, Ryanair, Mercedes, TUI, Verivox, Allianz, T-Systems, etc.;
  • The opportunity to change the project and/or develop expertise in an interesting business domain;
  • Job conditions ‚Äì you can work both fully remotely and from the office or can choose a hybrid variant;
  • Guarantee of professional, financial, and career growth! The company has introduced systems of mentoring and adaptation for each new employee;
  • The opportunity to earn up to an additional 1,000 EUR per month, depending on the level of expertise, which will be included in the annual bonus, by participating in the company's activities;
  • Access to the corporate training portal, where the entire knowledge base of the company is collected and which is constantly updated;
  • Bright corporate life (parties / pizza days / PlayStation / fruits / coffee / snacks / movies);
  • Certification compensation (AWS, PMP, etc);
  • Referral program;
  • English courses;
  • Private health insurance and compensation for sports activities.
key_skills: React, JavaScript, TypeScript, Redux, HTML, CSS

name: Middle Frontend Engineer
description:
We are a multinational CPaaS provider offering a wide variety of communication services for businesses. Our carrier platform leverages local IP edge in 12 locations worldwide to ensure minimal latency from customer premises to the far end.

We have a proven track record of solving complex customer challenges and beating competition in the Asia Pacific, European and US markets.

We are seeking a Middle Frontend Engineer to design flexible architectures and work across modern and legacy codebases. You‚Äôll collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver clean, maintainable solutions.

The position is based in Almaty with a hybrid schedule.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Proactively contribute to the design of new features, suggesting innovative technical solutions and accurately estimating development timelines.
  • Develop and implement modern high-performance web interfaces.
  • Craft well-structured, thoroughly tested code, actively providing constructive code reviews for team members.
  • Collaborate effectively as a team, readily sharing your expertise and providing insightful guidance in your area of responsibility.

Qualifications:

  • 4+ years of experience in software development.

  • Strong knowledge of JavaScript, jQuery, and legacy codebases.

  • Experience with Flutter or similar technologies.

  • Experience working with AI agents or related tools.

  • Ability to design flexible architecture from scratch.

  • Skilled in solving problems through multiple approaches and selecting optimal solutions.

  • Clean, clear, and maintainable code writing.

  • Proactive ownership of services within your responsibility.

  • Experience working in cross-functional teams.

Tech Stack:

  • React 18, TypeScript, Styled Components, Redux Toolkit (RTK)

  • Vite, Rails templating

  • JavaScript, React (class-based), jQuery

  • Testing: Cypress (E2E)

name: Software Functional Testing Trainee
description:
EPAM Campus offers a free Software Functional Testing training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will explore various testing types, methods and approaches, master test planning, requirements analysis and creating effective checklists, as well as learn how to report test results.

You can progress through this self-paced program at your convenience, as all learning materials will be accessible anytime. On average, you will need ~ 10 weeks and ~ 20 hours of weekly engagement.

Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with software development & testing life cycles and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing basics (Test Artifacts, Test Methods, Types and Levels, Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Strong communication skills

Nice to have:

  • Understanding of programming basics, networks, API and databases

We offer

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Automated Testing in JavaScript Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in JavaScript training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in JavaScript and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of JavaScript programming (Variables, Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Functions, Strings, Arrays)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Ruby on Rails Senior Developer
description:
We are looking for experienced professionals who can design and develop complex software systems from scratch, design project-wide technical solutions, as well as establish and control the best development practices.

What we expect from you:

  • 3+ years of experience in IT
  • Experience with Ruby on Rails
  • Experience with databases (SQL or NoSQL)
  • Good understanding of *nix systems
  • English skills should be sufficient for taking part in conversations on the technical aspects of projects

It would be a plus to have:

  • Experience with Frontend development (HTML 5, JavaScript / TypeScript, Angular / React, etc.)
  • Hands-on experience with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud)
  • Experience in setting up and supporting development processes (CI/CD, code review, static code analysis, automated testing)
  • Experience working with SCRUM
  • Experience in creating technical documentation

We can offer:

  • Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
  • Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
  • Career development system with clear skill qualifications
  • Flexible working hours aligned to your schedule
  • Options to work remotely
  • Corporate medical insurance covering services of private and public medical centers
  • English courses online
  • Corporate parties and events for employees and their children
  • Gym membership compensation, corporate sport competitions (cybersport included)
  • 5 days of paid sick leave per year with no obligation to submit a sick-leave certificate

name: Business Central Solution Architect
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central Solution Architect to lead pre-sales engagements, design tailored ERP solutions, and manage end-to-end implementations. This role requires a strong foundation in finance, deep expertise in Business Central and Power Platform, and hands-on experience with third-party integrations and complex data migrations.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead pre-sales activities including client workshops, solution presentations, and proposal development

  • Assess complex customer business challenges and design comprehensive solutions leveraging Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, Power Platform, and relevant third-party extensions

  • Design and implement third-party integrations to extend Business Central functionality and ensure seamless interoperability

  • Address and manage complex data migration requests, including legacy system analysis, mapping, and transformation strategies

  • Oversee full project lifecycle: from discovery and design to implementation and post-go-live support

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including sales, delivery, and technical consultants

  • Contribute to internal solution frameworks, methodologies, and best practices

Required Qualifications:

  • Proven experience as a Solution Architect in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central

  • Strong educational background in finance (degree in Accounting, Finance, or Economics)

  • Demonstrated success in pre-sales engagements and client-facing solution design

  • Hands-on experience with Power Platform (Power BI, Power Automate, Power Apps)

  • Experience designing and implementing third-party integrations

  • Proven ability to manage complex data migrations from legacy systems to Business Central

  • Excellent communication, presentation, and stakeholder management skills.

  • English level C1+

Preferred Skills:

  • Domain expertise and experience with ERP implementations in industries such as wholesale/retail, manufacturing is a strong plus

  • Microsoft Business Central and Power Platform Certifications are a plus

We can offer:

  • Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
  • Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
  • Career development system with clear skill qualifications
  • Options to work remotely
  • Compensation for medical expenses
  • English courses online
  • Corporate parties and events for employees and their children
  • Internal conferences, workshops and meetups for learning and experience sharing
  • Gym membership compensation, corporate sport competitions (cybersport included)
  • 5 days of paid sick leave per year with no obligation to submit a sick-leave certificate

name: SAP Cloud Development Team Lead
description:
At LeverX, we have had the privilege of working on 1,500+ SAP projects, including some with Fortune 500 companies. With 20+ years in the market, our team of 2,200+ is strong, reliable, and always evolving: learning, growing, and striving for excellence.

We are looking for an SAP Cloud Development Team Lead to join us. Let‚Äôs see if we are a good fit for each other!

We offer:

  • Opportunity to lead cutting-edge SAP cloud and AI initiatives.
  • Direct collaboration with SAP engineering and product teams.
  • Leadership impact on technology strategy and team growth.
  • Participation in co-innovation and early-adopter programs.
  • Competitive package, SAP certifications, and global project exposure

Required skills:

  • 5+ years of experience in SAP development with strong BTP expertise.
  • Hands-on skills with SAP CAP or SAP RAP, Node.js or Java, Cloud Foundry, Kyma, or Kubernetes, REST/OData/Event-driven architecture.
  • Experience working with Git, CI/CD, and automated pipelines.
  • Experience building and leading engineering teams in enterprise delivery.
  • Understanding of modern AI concepts.
  • Strong stakeholder management and communication skills.
  • English B2+.

Nice-to-have skills:

  • SAP BTP or ABAP Cloud certifications.
  • Experience with SAP Generative AI, SAP Datasphere, SAP Integration Suite, Identity and security (OAuth2, SSO, XSUAA), or SAP UI5, SAP Fiori, or modern front-end (React/TS).
  • Background in AI workloads.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead the design and delivery of SAP BTP applications using CAP/RAP, Event Mesh, cloud integrations, and Generative AI services.
  • Drive innovation and define the technology vision and roadmap for SAP cloud-native and AI-enabled solutions.
  • Build and mentor a high-performing cloud engineering team, fostering continuous learning and technical excellence.
  • Own the hiring and interview process for new engineering talent.
  • Collaborate with SAP product teams and strategic customers through co-innovation and early-adoption initiatives.
  • Implement modern DevOps and secure-by-design practices across all development activities.
  • Promote engineering best practices through knowledge sharing, tech talks, and internal community initiatives.
key_skills: Business English, SAP, Leadership Skills, SAP Cloud, BTP

name: Automated Testing in JavaScript Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in JavaScript training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in JavaScript and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of JavaScript programming (Variables, Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Functions, Strings, Arrays)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Software Functional Testing Trainee
description:
EPAM Campus offers a free Software Functional Testing training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will explore various testing types, methods and approaches, master test planning, requirements analysis and creating effective checklists, as well as learn how to report test results.

You can progress through this self-paced program at your convenience, as all learning materials will be accessible anytime. On average, you will need ~ 10 weeks and ~ 20 hours of weekly engagement.

Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with software development & testing life cycles and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing basics (Test Artifacts, Test Methods, Types and Levels, Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Strong communication skills

Nice to have:

  • Understanding of programming basics, networks, API and databases

We offer

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Automated Testing in .NET Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in .NET training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in –°# and the .NET platform, as well as master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~ 2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of C# programming (Integers, Static Methods, Boolean and Logical Operators, Conditional Statements, Real Numbers, Exceptions, Iteration Statements)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: AI Solutions Engineer
description:
Join AI automation team of a leading global insurance group, providing property, casualty, and life insurance solutions. You‚Äôll work directly with VP of engineering to bridge AI models and real-world applications, focusing on cloud AI services, and developing complex automation systems based on UiPath platform.

Requirements

  • Strong experience with Azure AI services

  • Extensive experience with UiPath AI automation

  • Solid understanding of LLM integration, prompt orchestration, and secure API design.

  • Hands on experience with Python, focusing on building Python APIs (FastAPI/Flask/Django)

  • Strong in data preparation: tokenization, embeddings, enrichment, preprocessing.

  • Knowledge of data preprocessing for unstructured/structured data (text, PDFs, images).

  • Experience implementing RAG patterns with vector stores/search.

  • Proficiency with vector databases (Pinecone, Redis, Azure Cognitive Search).

Nice to have

  • Experience with AWS AI services

  • Experience working in the scope of large-scale automation projects

We can offer:

  • Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
  • Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
  • Career development system with clear skill qualifications
  • Flexible working hours aligned to your schedule
  • Options to work remotely
  • Compensation for medical expenses
  • English courses online
  • Corporate parties and events for employees and their children
  • Gym membership compensation, corporate sport competitions (cybersport included)
  • 5 days of paid sick leave per year with no obligation to submit a sick-leave certificate

name: Automated Testing in Java Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in Java training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in Java and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of Java programming (Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Arrays, Classes)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials

  • Technology mentors from around the globe

  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs

  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience

  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Middle/Senior Java Backend Developer
description:
The Astana International Financial Centre Authority is seeking a Middle/Senior Java Backend Developer to join our Technology Department. This role is critical to delivering and supporting scalable, robust software solutions. You will lead the backend development lifecycle - from conception and architecture to deployment and maintenance - while ensuring high standards of performance, security, and reliability.

Key responsibilities:

  • Develop high-quality software design and architecture.

  • Identify, prioritize, and execute tasks across the software development lifecycle.

  • Document and demonstrate solutions by producing clear technical documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, and clean code.

  • Ensure all software remains current with the latest technologies.

  • Maintain application performance, uptime, responsiveness, and scalability.

  • Uphold high standards of code quality and application design.

  • Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.

  • Work closely with DevOps teams to ensure seamless integration and deployment pipelines.

  • Implement robust security and data protection measures, maintaining compliance with industry standards.

  • Design user interactions on websites.

  • Develop backend website applications.

Qualification requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technologies, Software Engineering, or a related field. Master‚Äôs degree is preferred.

  • Minimum 3 years of professional experience in backend or full-stack software development.

  • Certifications in software development, ITSM, or desktop administration are a plus.

Skills & competencies:

  • Strong programming and problem-solving skills.

  • Proficiency in Spring Boot, Maven, PostgreSQL, and Git.

  • Familiarity with REST, RPC, and SOAP APIs.

  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes is a plus).

  • Experience with message queues like RabbitMQ or Kafka is a plus.

  • Knowledge of system design, backend logic, and API integration.

  • Ability to lead and collaborate in Agile environments.

  • Strong time management, communication, and organizational skills.

  • Experience in technical team leadership is an advantage.

  • Language proficiency in Kazakh, Russian, and English.

What we offer:

  • Be a part of a one-of-a-kind financial center that combines the best practices of advanced financial centers worldwide.
  • Collaborate with some of the most skilled professionals in the country.
  • Enjoy a social package that includes voluntary medical insurance.
  • Work in a comfortable building equipped with cafeterias and recreation areas.

Equal opportunity Employer:

At AIFC Authority, we are committed to providing equal employment opportunities to all qualified individuals. We believe that a diverse and inclusive workforce enhances our creativity, innovation, and overall success. We welcome and encourage candidates from all walks of life to apply and join our team.

Your career growth and contribution are waiting at AIFCA!
key_skills: DevOps, QA, PostgreSQL, Spring Boot, REST API

description:

name: Software Functional Testing Intern
description:
EPAM Campus offers an intensive Software Functional Testing internship program that will equip you with the deep knowledge and hands-on experience needed to kickstart your career in tech. EPAM professionals will help you learn to conduct requirements analysis for real use cases, develop your skills in creating test artifacts for a specific project, as well as explore the basics of prompt engineering and AI tools for QA specialists.

This program will last ~2-4 months and require ~20-40 hours of weekly engagement. The more time you devote to learning, the faster you will complete it.

Upon its successful completion, we will consider you for open positions based on your demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with the software development & testing life cycle and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing theory‚ÄØ(Test Artifacts; Test Methods, Types and Levels; Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Experience with requirement analysis, test design and defect reporting
  • Excellent communication skills

Nice to have:

Familiarity with API testing and SQL queries

We offer

  • Market-oriented content tested in hundreds of runs
  • Deep dive into your specialization and related emerging technologies
  • Hands-on learning through practical tasks and real project simulations
  • Regular guidance from technology mentors and your Resource Manager
  • AI tools to deliver a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Access to EPAM internal education resources for professional growth
  • Chance to join our team upon successful graduation

name: Android-—Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ (Senior)
description:
Senior-level, 4+ years of Android experience, strong Kotlin skills, hybrid format (Almaty), fintech background preferred


Core Skills: Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Coroutines, MVI/MVVM, Android architecture & lifecycle, design patterns
Location: Kazakhstan, Almaty (3 days office / 2 days remote)

Responsibilities on the Project
Implementation of modules in the new mobile application.

Required:
Knowledge and experience in using Jetpack Compose for development.
Knowledge and experience in asynchronous programming with Coroutines.

Candidate's Portrait
Hybrid work format, Almaty
3 days in the office, 2 remote
Engagement until the end of the year at minimum, possible extension
Experience:

Minimum 4 years in Android application development.
Advanced Kotlin knowledge: ability to write clean, efficient, and maintainable code.
Android expertise: deep understanding of the platform, including architecture, lifecycle, and key components.
Asynchronous programming: confident use of Coroutines and understanding of asynchronous principles.
Architectural approaches: experience with MVI and MVVM architectures.
Design patterns: knowledge and practical application of key design patterns.

Additional:

Jetpack Compose: experience with Compose is a big plus, but if not, we are ready to provide training.
Experience working in fintech companies.

name: Automated Testing in .NET Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in .NET training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in –°# and the .NET platform, as well as master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~ 2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of C# programming (Integers, Static Methods, Boolean and Logical Operators, Conditional Statements, Real Numbers, Exceptions, Iteration Statements)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages
