name: Team Lead (Frontend/Full Stack)
description:
We are seeking a Team Lead w/ strong Frontend or Full Stack (Frontend + Java) experience to oversee a distributed, cross-functional team of 7+ members (including back-end, front-end, full-stack, database developers, and QA engineers) while also contributing technically to our projects. Reporting directly to the CTO, you will ensure successful sprint delivery, maintain high development standards, and foster a results-oriented culture. You will be accountable for the team‚Äôs performance, guiding technical decisions within your domain and handling administrative responsibilities such as goal setting, mentorship, and performance reviews.

Main Responsibilities:

  • Oversee and lead design, development, and maintenance of new and existing application features.
  • Oversee and lead upgrades and refactoring of existing application functionality using modern technologies and frameworks such as React and Java.
  • Participate in the architectural design and development of high-quality applications.

Expected Results:

  • Strong Team Performance ‚Äì Maintain a high-performing, accountable team that consistently delivers on sprint goals.
  • Reliable Delivery ‚Äì Ensure timely, high-quality releases that support business growth and market expansion.
  • Technical Excellence ‚Äì Drive Frontend (and optionally Java) best practices, ensuring maintainable, scalable, and efficient solutions.
  • Operational Efficiency ‚Äì Improve workflows, reduce bottlenecks, and enhance cross-functional collaboration.

Professional Qualifications:

  • Minimum of 7 years of experience as a Frontend or Full Stack (Frontend + Java) Developer, with at least 2 years in a leadership or team lead capacity.
  • Proven track record of contributing to 3+ projects (a portfolio or a GitHub account will be a significant plus).
  • Strong knowledge of modern Frontend technologies and frameworks.
  • Expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, React and their integrations with RESTful APIs.
  • Deep understanding of micro-frontend architecture.
  • Experience with state management (MobX, Redux, Zustand, etc.)
  • Strong understanding of web security principles (OWASP, XSS/CSRF protection).
  • Familiarity with build tools like Maven or Gradle.
  • Adherence to software development best practices: SOLID, DRY, YAGNI, KISS principles, and GoF Patterns.
  • Experience in CI/CD pipelines using tools such as Docker, CircleCI, or GitLab.
  • Comfortable reading and refactoring existing codebases.
  • Proven ability to lead and inspire a diverse technical team in a distributed environment.
  • Strong sense of initiative, proactivity, and accountability for team results.
  • Excellent communication and conflict resolution skills.
  • Effective time management and organisational abilities.
  • Results-oriented with a knack for problem-solving and decision-making.
  • English - upper intermediate.

Will be a plus:

  • Previous experience in the fintech industry.
  • Experience with payment integrations.
  • Familiarity with BPM tools, such as Camunda.
  • Experience with Next.js.
  • Expertise in React Native.
  • Experience with UI component library design and management.
  • Expertise in Java.
  • Working experience with PostgreSQL and AWS technologies (e.g., Lambdas, API Gateway, DynamoDB).
  • Experience with Microservices and Hexagonal architecture.

What We Offer:

  • Join a fast-scaling FinTech company where your decisions shape the business and your contributions truly matter.
  • Attractive compensation package aligned with your experience and performance, plus performance-based incentives.
  • Enjoy 20 paid days off annually, flexible scheduling, and a supportive, people-first culture.
  • Comprehensive medical coverage to keep you and your family protected.
  • Work in an international, agile team with ambitious goals, modern tools, and a strong sense of purpose.

name: Senior Backend Software Developer (Java / Go)
description:
Join Netcracker Technology to work for a forward-looking software company that offers mission-critical BSS/OSS solutions to service providers around the globe. Our comprehensive portfolio of software solutions and professional services enables large-scale digital transformations, unlocking the opportunities of the cloud, analytics, virtualization, and 5G mobile networks. With an unbroken service delivery track record of over 25 years, our unique combination of technology, people, and expertise helps companies transform their networks and improve customer experiences.

Responsibilities:

  • As part of Netcracker Cloud Platform, develop variety of cloud backend applications and services.
  • Design and implement complex elements of cloud architecture; participate in architecture discussions and sessions.
  • Work with major cloud providers to build expertise across public clouds and micro-service architecture.
  • Owns cloud expertise and closely with stakeholders to build highly available and reliable cloud solutions.
  • Contribute to open source 3rd party products.

Qualifications:

  • 5 - 10 years of experience as a software developer;
  • Excellent Java or Golang knowledge: language fundamentals, memory model, concurrency patterns, and best practices.
  • SQL knowledge and strong understanding of both relational (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL (e.g., Cassandra, Redis) databases.
  • Experience in micro-service development and cloud-based architecture patterns;
  • Good understanding of Docker and Kubernetes usage for application containerization: Openshift, Kubernetes, Docker, public Kubernetes engines (Azure, Google, AWS).
  • Hands-on experience with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or Argo CD to ensure smooth deployment pipelines.

We offer:

  • Professional growth in the international business environment;
  • More than 300 hard and soft-skills programs by the corporate career development center;
  • Free English courses and opportunity to practice it daily;
  • Flexible work scedule;
  • 2 modern offices in the city center with unlimited coffee and snacks;
  • Medical insurance for employees;
  • Possibility to go to the business trips between company offices in different locations;
  • Collaboration with opensource community;
  • Friendly atmosphere, sports activities and corporate events.
key_skills: Java, Spring Boot, Apache Kafka, SQL, NoSQL, Golang, Python, Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift

name: Automated Testing in .NET Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in .NET training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in –°# and the .NET platform, as well as master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~ 2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of C# programming (Integers, Static Methods, Boolean and Logical Operators, Conditional Statements, Real Numbers, Exceptions, Iteration Statements)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Intern Developer
description:
Itransition invites you to join our free internship for commercial software development. Training takes place of 3 specializations: Front-end, PHP and .Net.
Applicants will have to pass an entrance test. Please apply with a resume and after we consider your application, we will get back to you with more details.

Internship outline:

  • Attending lectures and seminars
  • Performing software development tasks
  • Independent study of training materials
  • Team work
  • Implementing a project on fully-functional web application development

What we expect from you:

  • Basic knowledge in programming(.Net, PHP or JavaScript)

  • Understanding of principles of web-development
  • Understanding of basics of version control systems (Git, Subversion)
  • Command of English, at least enough to understand technical texts
  • A drive to learn

What we offer:

  • 2-month internship with the possibility of further employment via a world leading software development company (according to Forrester, Deloitte and Zinnov Research).
  • Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
  • Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
  • Career development system with clear skill qualifications
  • Flexible working hours aligned to your schedule
  • Options to work remotely
  • Corporate medical insurance covering services of private and public medical centers
  • English courses online
  • Corporate parties and events for employees and their children
  • Internal conferences, workshops and meetups for learning and experience sharing
  • Gym membership compensation, corporate sport competitions (cybersport included)
  • 5 days of paid sick leave per year with no obligation to submit a sick-leave certificate

name: Automated Testing in JavaScript Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in JavaScript training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in JavaScript and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of JavaScript programming (Variables, Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Functions, Strings, Arrays)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Senior Data Integration Engineer
description:
We are seeking a Senior Data Integration Engineer with expertise in data management, integration, and cloud-based technologies.

This role requires a solution-oriented professional passionate about creating and delivering advanced data systems. If you excel in cloud infrastructures and value precision, we encourage you to apply!

This position offers remote setup with the flexibility to work from any location in Kazakhstan, whether it's your home or well-equipped offices in Astana, Almaty or Karaganda.

Responsibilities

  • Design Data Integration solutions leveraging classic, modern, or hybrid cloud data tools
  • Collaborate with product and engineering teams to define requirements, evaluate new features, and make architectural decisions
  • Address business challenges by developing technical solutions aligned with quality and technical standards
  • Perform code reviews and execute testing processes to ensure alignment with technical specifications
  • Deliver comprehensive documentation for architectural designs and technical implementations

Requirements

  • Advanced knowledge of Data Integration tools such as Azure Data Factory, AWS Glue, and GCP Dataflow
  • Background in working with relational databases and programming tools including SQL, Python, PySpark
  • Proficiency in managing cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP to build scalable data environments
  • Understanding of Data Security principles, modern Data Management practices, and CI/CD workflows
  • Expertise in methodologies for data modeling, including OLAP, OLTP, ETL, and Data Warehousing
  • Capability to articulate complex ideas effectively with proficiency in English

We offer

  • We connect like-minded people: :
    • Delivering innovative solutions to industry leaders, making a global impact
    • Enjoyable working environment, whether it is the vibrant office or the comfort of your own home
    • Opportunity to work abroad for up to two months per year
    • Relocation opportunities within our offices in 55+ countries
    • Corporate and social events
  • We invest in your growth:‚ÄØ :
    • Leadership development, career advising, soft skills and well-being programs
    • Certifications, including GCP, Azure and AWS
    • Unlimited access to LinkedIn Learning and Get Abstract
    • Free English classes with certified teachers
    • Discounts in local language schools, including online courses for the Kazakh language
  • We cover it all: :
    • Participation in the Employee Stock Purchase Plan
    • Monetary bonuses for engaging in the referral program
    • Medical & family care package
    • Six trust days per year (sick leave without a medical certificate)
    • Coverage of psychology sessions of your choice
    • Benefits package (sports activities, a variety of stores and services)

EPAM is a team of technologists and innovators united by a passion for technology. In Kazakhstan, we operate across all cities with offices in Astana, Almaty, and Karaganda and work with the world's leading companies from different industries. In 2023, EPAM received the Export Excellence Award at the esteemed Digital Bridge Awards, showcasing our commitment to excellence and innovation.

name: Software Functional Testing Trainee
description:
EPAM Campus offers a free Software Functional Testing training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will explore various testing types, methods and approaches, master test planning, requirements analysis and creating effective checklists, as well as learn how to report test results.

You can progress through this self-paced program at your convenience, as all learning materials will be accessible anytime. On average, you will need ~ 10 weeks and ~ 20 hours of weekly engagement.

Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with software development & testing life cycles and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing basics (Test Artifacts, Test Methods, Types and Levels, Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Strong communication skills

Nice to have:

  • Understanding of programming basics, networks, API and databases

We offer

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Fullstack QA Engineer (Kotlin)
description:
inDrive is an international technological platform for transport and personal services. We are one of the top 2 mobile travel booking services in the world with over 150 million installs, over 2 billion trips, 600+ cities in 40+ countries.

inDrive is a product used by tens of millions of people every month. They make urban or intercity trips, order cargo transportation or courier delivery, look for work and call handymen to provide household services.

inDrive employs more than 2,000 employees, of which 450+ are developers, divided into 50+ cross-functional teams.

Our stack: we write tests in Kotlin, and use Maven, Appium, Docker, JUnit5, Allure.

Responsibilities

  • Conduct automated testing for mobile apps (iOS and Android) and web platforms.
  • Write UI and API automated tests using Kotlin, Appium, or other relevant tools.
  • Develop and maintain test plans, test cases, and documentation for mobile and web applications
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and clarify ambiguities.
  • Perform regression testing to ensure product stability after new changes.
  • Participate in Agile ceremonies like sprint planning and provide input on testing scope and needs.
  • Analyze test results, document bugs, and work closely with development teams for resolution.

Qualifications

  • Minimum of 2 years as a QA Automation Engineer and 1 year in mobile and web app testing, including cross browser compatibility and responsive design testing
  • Proficiency in automated testing systems such as Appium Kotlin Java and Selenium with familiarity in client server principles
  • Hands on experience with Android iOS testing including emulators traffic sniffing and OS specific testing
  • Competency in API testing using Postman database operations CRUD and basic command line tools such as bash or zsh
  • Experience coordinating teams and collaborating across departments to ensure testing workflows are efficient and aligned
  • Strong teamwork skills and familiarity with TMS tools like TestOps Jira Slack and Git or Github

Conditions & Benefits

  • Stable salary, official employment
  • Health insurance
  • Hybrid work mode and flexile schedule
  • Relocation package offered for candidates from other regions
  • Access to professional counseling services including psychological, financial, and legal support
  • Discount club membership
  • Diverse internal training programs
  • Partially or fully payed additional training courses
  • All necessary work equipment
key_skills: Kotlin, Java, QA, JUnit5, UI test, Appium, QA Auto

name: Software Functional Testing Intern
description:
EPAM Campus offers an intensive Software Functional Testing internship program that will equip you with the deep knowledge and hands-on experience needed to kickstart your career in tech. EPAM professionals will help you learn to conduct requirements analysis for real use cases, develop your skills in creating test artifacts for a specific project, as well as explore the basics of prompt engineering and AI tools for QA specialists.

This program will last ~2-4 months and require ~20-40 hours of weekly engagement. The more time you devote to learning, the faster you will complete it.

Upon its successful completion, we will consider you for open positions based on your demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with the software development & testing life cycle and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing theory‚ÄØ(Test Artifacts; Test Methods, Types and Levels; Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Experience with requirement analysis, test design and defect reporting
  • Excellent communication skills

Nice to have:

Familiarity with API testing and SQL queries

We offer

  • Market-oriented content tested in hundreds of runs
  • Deep dive into your specialization and related emerging technologies
  • Hands-on learning through practical tasks and real project simulations
  • Regular guidance from technology mentors and your Resource Manager
  • AI tools to deliver a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Access to EPAM internal education resources for professional growth
  • Chance to join our team upon successful graduation

name: Software Functional Testing Trainee
description:
EPAM Campus offers a free Software Functional Testing training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will explore various testing types, methods and approaches, master test planning, requirements analysis and creating effective checklists, as well as learn how to report test results.

You can progress through this self-paced program at your convenience, as all learning materials will be accessible anytime. On average, you will need ~ 10 weeks and ~ 20 hours of weekly engagement.

Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with software development & testing life cycles and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing basics (Test Artifacts, Test Methods, Types and Levels, Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Strong communication skills

Nice to have:

  • Understanding of programming basics, networks, API and databases

We offer

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: QA Automation Trainee
description:
International company Andersen, one of the leaders in the outsource production market, is recruiting for QA Automation traineeship with further employment in Kazakhstan (in the office: Almaty).

Andersen Company is interested in the rapid professional development of employees and improvement of their skills, is ready to invest funds and time. Therefore, our competitive advantage is considered to be rapid growth, in terms of salaries, among other things.

Requirements:

  • Intermediate or higher level of English (verbal communication);
  • QA Manual experience and/or successfully completed courses in Software Manual Testing;
  • knowledge of the basics of autotesting tools;
  • any programming experience (Java, JS, Python, C#);
  • will be a plus: Intermediate or higher level of German.

If you are interested in our free online courses ‚ÄúQuality Assurance for Beginners‚Äù, please indicate ‚ÄúCourses‚Äù in the response.

Requirements for free online courses ‚ÄúQuality Assurance for Beginners‚Äù:

  • English level: Intermediate or higher (verbal communication);
  • elementary knowledge of software testing and programming.

Conditions:

  • practice on a training project under the guidance of experienced tutors;
  • control of the trainee's knowledge mastery and feedback;
  • office-based format of training;
  • corporate English language courses at the office or online;
  • access to the corporate internal training programme (own educational platform);
  • participation in the company's vibrant corporate life.

An Andersen trainee can confidently count on:

  • high professionalism of mentors;
  • careful and attentive attitude during training;
  • assistance and support during the training process and when entering a commercial project afterwards;
  • guaranteed employment upon successful completion of training.

Based on the evaluation of your candidacy, you may be awarded a scholarship of 120 000 - 240 000 KZT.

Andersen is a great opportunity to start and grow in IT!

name: Full stack .NET developer (with Blazor)
description:
PSI is a leading Contract Research Organization (CRO) with 30 years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry. Originated in Switzerland, PSI is a privately owned, full-service CRO with a global reach, supporting clinical trials across multiple countries and continents. Our reputation for being highly selective about the projects we undertake highlights our commitment to delivering high-quality, timely services across a broad spectrum of therapeutic indications.

At PSI, we foster an environment where a diverse range of colleagues feel welcomed and valued. Our inclusive culture is a cornerstone of our success, enabling us to attract and retain top talent globally.

We are not just about conducting clinical trials; we are about building a community where every team member has the opportunity to thrive and contribute to groundbreaking advancements in the pharmaceutical industry.

Job Description

As a Full stack Developer, you will be involved in development of projects for internal clients and will provide quality coding to support PSI business processes and operations.

Full-time employment based in Kazakhstan

You will:

  • Architect, develop and maintain business applications
  • Process user requests for developing of new and support for existing IT systems
  • Prepare documentation related to development and maintenance of business applications
  • Execute and implement software tests, participate in code reviews
  • Follow the development standards applied within the department
  • Track the development, maintenance and related tasks in the tracking system used within the team
  • Follow the progress of systems development technologies and advance professional skills as necessary

The ideal candidate will have:

  • Knowledge of building web-based applications
  • Knowledge of web technologies including JS(ES+), HTML5, CSS, Webpack
  • Knowledge of C# language, NET 8+, Blazor, technologies and best practices
  • Knowledge of unit-testing, knowledge of other testing methods is a plus
  • Knowledge of Transact SQL, MS SQL functions, stored procedures and other SQL objects
  • Familiarity with software analysis, testing and debugging code
  • Ability to write high-quality, efficient and easily testable code
  • Team-oriented, deadline-driven, with good communication skills
  • BSc/BA in computer science, software engineering or relevant discipline or an equivalent combination of knowledge and skills
  • Full working proficiency in English

Additional information

  • Stable, privately-owned company, organically growing since 1995
  • Opportunity to work hybrid/remotely in Kazakhstan
  • Intensive induction program, technical and industry-related trainings for an optimal start and continuous development
  • Diverse projects that include but are not limited to web and desktop apps, ERP system, BPM system, document management system and more
  • Friendly and supportive atmosphere in a committed team
  • International environment, with colleagues around the world
  • Opportunities to quickly see the results of your work
  • Attractive income package; performance-based bonus; corporate benefits

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain high-load microservices using Golang.
  • Design and implement RESTful, gRPC, and GraphQL APIs.
  • Work with data storage solutions including PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB.
  • Integrate and optimize message brokers such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, Redis, or NATS.
  • Ensure scalability, reliability, and security of distributed systems.
  • Build and maintain containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes.

Required Skills:

  • 2+ years of commercial experience with Golang.

  • English B2+ (mandatory, daily communication with the team).

  • Experience with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB.

  • Solid knowledge of REST APIs, gRPC, and GraphQL.

  • Experience with AWS S3, AWS, or Azure

  • Practical experience with Kafka, Redis, RabbitMQ, or NATS.

  • Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD processes.

Nice to have:

  • Experience with Python.

What we offer:

  • Remote work ‚Äì flexibility to work from anywhere.
  • Flexible schedule.
  • Opportunity to work in an international team and grow professionally.

If you are interested in this position, please submit your resume. We will be pleased to review your application and contact you for further selection stages.

name: QA Manual Trainee
description:
International company Andersen, one of the leaders in the outsource production market, is recruiting for QA Manual traineeship with further employment in Kazakhstan (in the office: Almaty).

Andersen Company is interested in the rapid professional development of employees and improvement of their skills, is ready to invest funds and time. Therefore, our competitive advantage is considered to be rapid growth, in terms of salaries, among other things.

Requirements:

  • Intermediate or higher level of English (verbal communication);

  • good knowledge of testing theory;

  • understanding of SQL;

  • understanding of WEB / Mobile apps;

  • work experience is not required;

  • will be a plus: technical background, any experience in programming, completed courses in testing area;

  • will be a plus: Intermediate or higher level of German.

If you are interested in our free online courses ‚ÄúQuality Assurance for Beginners‚Äù, please indicate ‚ÄúCourses‚Äù in the response.

Requirements for free online courses ‚ÄúQuality Assurance for Beginners‚Äù:

  • English level: Intermediate or higher (verbal communication);
  • elementary knowledge of software testing and programming.

Conditions:

  • practice on a training project under the guidance of experienced tutors;
  • control of the trainee's knowledge mastery and feedback;
  • office-based format of training;
  • corporate English language courses at the office or online;
  • access to the corporate internal training programme (own educational platform);
  • participation in the company's vibrant corporate life.

An Andersen trainee can confidently count on:

  • high professionalism of mentors;
  • careful and attentive attitude during training;
  • assistance and support during the training process and when entering a commercial project afterwards;
  • guaranteed employment upon successful completion of training.

Based on the evaluation of your candidacy, you may be awarded a scholarship of 120 000 - 240 000 KZT.

Andersen is a great opportunity to start and grow in IT!

name: Automated Testing in Java Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in Java training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in Java and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of Java programming (Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Arrays, Classes)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials

  • Technology mentors from around the globe

  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs

  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience

  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: QA Automation Engineer (Java)
description:
Andersen is hiring an QA Automation Engineer (Java) to join a FinTech project, building and testing a secure, scalable credit card management system for a major bank.

Our customer is a global leader in digital payments, operating in over 200 countries and enabling secure transactions worldwide. Recognized among the world‚Äôs most admired companies, it fosters a culture of innovation, diversity, and inclusion while offering strong career development opportunities. Committed to social responsibility and sustainability, the customer works to uplift people and communities everywhere.

The project is the development of a new credit card management system for a major bank, seamlessly integrated into the existing digital ecosystem. It is a large-scale initiative focused on building a secure, high-performance, and scalable platform to ensure efficient credit card lifecycle management and support the expansion of lending services.

Responsibilities:

  • Leading and execute manual and automated testing efforts to ensure software quality and reliability.
  • Developing, maintain, and review detailed test plans, test cases, and bug reports.
  • Performing API testing using tools like Postman, SoapUI, or RestAssured to validate backend services.
  • Demonstrating strong problem-solving skills to troubleshoot issues and optimize testing processes.
  • Communicating effectively across teams to ensure clear understanding of requirements, test results, and quality risks.
  • Utilizying automated testing frameworks such as Selenium, Jest, Cypress, or TestCafe to build and run test suites.
  • Integrating testing processes within CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI, or similar tools.

Must-haves:

  • Professional experience in QA and software testing for 5+ years.
  • Strong expertise in manual and automated testing methodologies.
  • Programming language Java.
  • Hands-on experience with test planning, execution, and defect management.
  • Proficiency with automated testing tools such as Selenium, Jest, Cypress, TestCafe, or similar.
  • Experience with API testing tools like Postman, SoapUI, or RestAssured.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, or CircleCI.
  • Solid understanding of Agile/Scrum methodologies.
  • Experience writing clear and detailed test cases, test plans, and bug reports.
  • Comfortable working with version control systems (Git) and participating in code reviews.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.
  • Experience mentoring junior QA engineers and leading QA efforts.
  • Level of English ‚Äì from Intermediate+ and above.

Nice-to-haves:

  • Knowledge of performance and security testing principles.
  • Performance and Load test experience (Apache JMeter or similar).
  • Experience mentoring junior QA engineers and leading QA efforts.

Reasons why this job would be interesting to you:

  • Experience in teamwork with leaders in FinTech, Healthcare, Retail, Telecom, and others. Andersen cooperates with such businesses as Samsung, Siemens, Johnson & Johnson, BNP Paribas, Ryanair, Mercedes, TUI, Verivox, Allianz, T-Systems, etc..
  • The opportunity to change the project and/or develop expertise in an interesting business domain.
  • Job conditions ‚Äì you can work both fully remotely and from the office or can choose a hybrid variant.
  • Guarantee of professional, financial, and career growth! The company has introduced systems of mentoring and adaptation for each new employee.
  • The opportunity to earn up to an additional 1,000 USD per month, depending on the level of expertise, which will be included in the annual bonus, by participating in the company's activities.
  • Access to the corporate training portal, where the entire knowledge base of the company is collected and which is constantly updated.
  • Bright corporate life (parties / pizza days / PlayStation / fruits / coffee / snacks / movies).
  • Certification compensation (AWS, PMP, etc).
  • Referral program.
  • English courses.
  • Private health insurance and compensation for sports activities.

Join us!

name: React¬†Native¬†Senior Developer
description:
We are looking for experienced professional who can design and develop complex software systems from scratch, design project-wide technical solutions, as well as establish and control the best development practices.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and enhance cross-platform mobile applications using React Native, ensuring high performance and quality on both iOS and Android
  • Collaborate with design and product teams to create seamless, intuitive, and visually appealing user interfaces
  • Optimize applications for maximum performance and scalability
  • Integrate third-party APIs and native libraries as needed
  • Conduct code reviews, write unit tests, and debug applications to ensure code quality and functionality
  • Maintain up-to-date knowledge of React Native advancements and apply best practices in coding, architecture, and development methodologies
  • Provide technical expertise to guide product development and offer solutions for complex issues
  • Participate in Agile ceremonies, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives

Requirements:

  • 4+ years of experience in IT and minimum of 2 years of proven experience as a React Native Developer
  • Expertise in React Native, React is essential
  • In-depth understanding of React Native architecture, component lifecycle, state management, and hooks, familiarity with nativebuild tools (Xcode, Android Studio) and native app design; principles, including offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
  • Experience with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and third-party integrations
  • Sound knowledge of HTML, CSS, and associated technologies for front-end development
  • Experience in code testing and debugging, leveraging tools such as Jest
  • Comprehensive understanding of both front-end and back-end development processes
  • Firm grasp of software development principles and methodologies, encompassing Agile, Scrum, and Waterfall
  • Excellent command of spoken and written English
  • Strong collaboration skills, enabling effective teamwork and communication within cross-functional teams
  • Ability to adapt quickly to emerging technologies and evolving project requirements
  • Outstanding communication skills and adeptness in collaborative teamwork
  • Strong organizational acumen and meticulousness to deliver top-notch work

Nice to have:

  • Familiarity with GraphQL and its fusion with frontend applications
  • Experience in creating native modules using Swift/Kotlin/Java
  • Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines

We can offer:

  • Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
  • Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
  • Career development system with clear skill qualifications
  • Options to work remotely
  • Compensation for medical expenses
  • English courses online
  • Corporate parties and events for employees and their children
  • Internal conferences, workshops and meetups for learning and experience sharing
  • Gym membership compensation, corporate sport competitions (cybersport included)
  • 5 days of paid sick leave per year with no obligation to submit a sick-leave certificate

name: Software Functional Testing Intern
description:
EPAM Campus offers an intensive Software Functional Testing internship program that will equip you with the deep knowledge and hands-on experience needed to kickstart your career in tech. EPAM professionals will help you learn to conduct requirements analysis for real use cases, develop your skills in creating test artifacts for a specific project, as well as explore the basics of prompt engineering and AI tools for QA specialists.

This program will last ~2-4 months and require ~20-40 hours of weekly engagement. The more time you devote to learning, the faster you will complete it.

Upon its successful completion, we will consider you for open positions based on your demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with the software development & testing life cycle and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing theory‚ÄØ(Test Artifacts; Test Methods, Types and Levels; Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Experience with requirement analysis, test design and defect reporting
  • Excellent communication skills

Nice to have:

Familiarity with API testing and SQL queries

We offer

  • Market-oriented content tested in hundreds of runs
  • Deep dive into your specialization and related emerging technologies
  • Hands-on learning through practical tasks and real project simulations
  • Regular guidance from technology mentors and your Resource Manager
  • AI tools to deliver a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Access to EPAM internal education resources for professional growth
  • Chance to join our team upon successful graduation

name: Software Functional Testing Intern
description:
EPAM Campus offers an intensive Software Functional Testing internship program that will equip you with the deep knowledge and hands-on experience needed to kickstart your career in tech. EPAM professionals will help you learn to conduct requirements analysis for real use cases, develop your skills in creating test artifacts for a specific project, as well as explore the basics of prompt engineering and AI tools for QA specialists.

This program will last ~2-4 months and require ~20-40 hours of weekly engagement. The more time you devote to learning, the faster you will complete it.

Upon its successful completion, we will consider you for open positions based on your demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with the software development & testing life cycle and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing theory‚ÄØ(Test Artifacts; Test Methods, Types and Levels; Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Experience with requirement analysis, test design and defect reporting
  • Excellent communication skills

Nice to have:

Familiarity with API testing and SQL queries

We offer

  • Market-oriented content tested in hundreds of runs
  • Deep dive into your specialization and related emerging technologies
  • Hands-on learning through practical tasks and real project simulations
  • Regular guidance from technology mentors and your Resource Manager
  • AI tools to deliver a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Access to EPAM internal education resources for professional growth
  • Chance to join our team upon successful graduation

name: QA Engineer
description:
Netcracker is a forward-looking, software technology company providing mission-critical solutions to communication service providers around the globe. Every year since our founding in 1993, we have demonstrated significant growth, strong profitability, and highly credible thought leadership. The reason we continue to thrive in today‚Äôs highly challenging and competitive market is simple: our ability to recruit and retain the best talent in the industry. If you‚Äôre ready to move your career forward and be recognized for the unique talent and skillset you bring, take a look at the opportunities below and apply for a position: QA Engineer

Responsibilities:

  • Preparation of Test Data;
  • Testing, including regression tests, of a solutions and its accompanying documentation;
  • Taking part in Bug/Change Management: create new bug/change issues, work with the existing ones;
  • Discussion with developers, engineers, business analysts of all the issues that are to be clarified, coordinated and defined more accurate; Coordination on quality issues with other departments;
  • Coordination with QA Lead, escalate and submit any outstanding issues encountered during testing/bug fixing to QA Lead approval;
  • Reporting about progress of work to QA Lead on daily basis.

Requirements:

  • English on high level to write and communicate with team & Customer; Communicative, active, customer-facing;
  • Understanding or experience with any task management system (JIRA);
  • Understanding of project life cycle & testing basics;
  • Desire to work in Quality Assurance.

We offer:

  • Opportunities for professional growth and career development;
  • Medical insurance for employees;
  • Sports activities and corporate events;
  • Friendly atmosphere;
  • Salary will be discussed individually with the successful candidate.

name: Automated Testing in JavaScript Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in JavaScript training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in JavaScript and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of JavaScript programming (Variables, Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Functions, Strings, Arrays)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Automated Testing in JavaScript Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in JavaScript training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in JavaScript and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of JavaScript programming (Variables, Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Functions, Strings, Arrays)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Senior¬†Full-Stack¬†Python¬†(Django+React)¬†Developer
description:
Requirements:

  • 4+ years of professional experience with Python
  • Production skills in frontend development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
  • Hands-on experience with Django and React
  • Good understanding of asynchronous programming or parallel computing concepts
  • Solid understanding of SQL databases, including indexes and locking mechanisms
  • Proactive, self-motivated, and eager to take ownership of tasks
  • Fluent English

Nice to have:

  • Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
  • Experience in setting up and supporting development processes (CI/CD, code review, static code analysis, automated testing)
  • Experience working with SCRUM
  • Experience in creating technical documentation
  • Hands-on experience with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud)

We can offer:

  • Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
  • Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
  • Career development system with clear skill qualifications
  • Flexible working hours aligned to your schedule
  • Options to work remotely
  • Compensation of medical costs
  • English courses online
  • Corporate parties and events for employees and their children
  • Internal conferences, workshops and meetups for learning and experience sharing
  • Gym membership compensation, corporate sport competitions (cybersport included)
  • 5 days of paid sick leave per year with no obligation to submit a sick-leave certificate

name: Test Engineer Trainee
description:
International company Andersen, one of the leaders in the outsource production market, is recruiting for QA Manual traineeship with further employment in Kazakhstan (in the office: Almaty).

Andersen Company is interested in the rapid professional development of employees and improvement of their skills, is ready to invest funds and time. Therefore, our competitive advantage is considered to be rapid growth, in terms of salaries, among other things.

Requirements:

  • Intermediate or higher level of English (verbal communication);

  • good knowledge of testing theory;

  • understanding of SQL;

  • understanding of WEB / Mobile apps;

  • work experience is not required;

  • will be a plus: technical background, any experience in programming, completed courses in testing area;

  • will be a plus: Intermediate or higher level of German.

If you are interested in our free online courses ‚ÄúQuality Assurance for Beginners‚Äù, please indicate ‚ÄúCourses‚Äù in the response.

Requirements for free online courses ‚ÄúQuality Assurance for Beginners‚Äù:

  • English level: Intermediate or higher (verbal communication);
  • elementary knowledge of software testing and programming.

Conditions:

  • practice on a training project under the guidance of experienced tutors;
  • control of the trainee's knowledge mastery and feedback;
  • office-based format of training;
  • corporate English language courses at the office or online;
  • access to the corporate internal training programme (own educational platform);
  • participation in the company's vibrant corporate life.

An Andersen trainee can confidently count on:

  • high professionalism of mentors;
  • careful and attentive attitude during training;
  • assistance and support during the training process and when entering a commercial project afterwards;
  • guaranteed employment upon successful completion of training.

Based on the evaluation of your candidacy, you may be awarded a scholarship of 120 000 - 240 000 KZT.

Andersen is a great opportunity to start and grow in IT!

Company Overview:
Join us at GuardinAI, a startup dedicated to solving Trust & Safety problems by leveraging advanced AI/ML technologies. We are building and offering a suite of robust web-application solutions for B2B clients.

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. This role
requires a mix of front-end and back-end development skills, contributing to the
development and optimization of our web-based AI solutions. The ideal candidate will
be adept in managing and scaling web applications to meet the evolving needs of our
global clients.


Responsibilities:
‚óè Develop and maintain the front-end and back-end components of our web
application.
‚óè Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
‚óè Ensure the performance, quality, security, and responsiveness of our web-application application.
‚óè Integrate with data storage solutions (PostgreSQL and others).
‚óè Maintain code integrity and organization using Git; follow code change best practices.
‚óè Utilize Amazon Web Services (AWS) for scalable infrastructure solutions.
‚óè Provide maintenance and support for existing functionalities to enhance
performance.
‚óè Keep up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends to apply them
within the role.


Technical Skills:
‚óè Proficiency in JavaScript framework React.js.
‚óè Strong backend knowledge and experience with Node.js and Express.
‚óè Experience with AWS and modern deployment workflows (S3, Cloudfront, Route53, and others).
‚óè Familiarity with relational database management systems, preferably
PostgreSQL (or MySQL, etc).
‚óè Solid understanding of Git for version control.


Qualifications:
‚óè Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science; Master‚Äôs degree preferred.
‚óè At least 2-3 years of professional experience in full-stack development.
‚óè Strong analytical skills and problem-solving aptitude; curious and always learning new things.
‚óè Excellent communication skills and proficiency in English (B2 level at least)

name: PHP Trainee
description:
International company Andersen, one of the leaders in the outsource production market, is recruiting for PHP traineeship with further employment in Kazakhstan (in the office: Almaty or Kazakhstan remote).

Andersen Company is interested in the rapid professional development of employees and improvement of their skills, is ready to invest funds and time. Therefore, our competitive advantage is considered to be rapid growth, in terms of salaries, among other things.

Requirements:

  • Intermediate or higher level of English (verbal communication);
  • strong theoretical knowledge of PHP, skills in working with programming environments;
  • experience with frameworks (for example, Symfony/Laravel/Zend);
  • training/pet-projects in the portfolio
  • Intermediate or higher level of German will be a plus.

Conditions:

  • practice on a training project under the guidance of experienced tutors;
  • control of the trainee's knowledge mastery and feedback;
  • office-based or remote format of training;
  • corporate English language courses at the office or online;
  • access to the corporate internal training programme (own educational platform);
  • participation in the company's vibrant corporate life.

An Andersen trainee can confidently count on:

  • high professionalism of mentors;
  • careful and attentive attitude during training;
  • assistance and support during the training process and when entering a commercial project afterwards;
  • guaranteed employment upon successful completion of training.

Andersen is a great opportunity to start and grow in IT!

name: Software Functional Testing Intern
description:
EPAM Campus offers an intensive Software Functional Testing internship program that will equip you with the deep knowledge and hands-on experience needed to kickstart your career in tech. EPAM professionals will help you learn to conduct requirements analysis for real use cases, develop your skills in creating test artifacts for a specific project, as well as explore the basics of prompt engineering and AI tools for QA specialists.

This program will last ~2-4 months and require ~20-40 hours of weekly engagement. The more time you devote to learning, the faster you will complete it.

Upon its successful completion, we will consider you for open positions based on your demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with the software development & testing life cycle and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing theory‚ÄØ(Test Artifacts; Test Methods, Types and Levels; Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Experience with requirement analysis, test design and defect reporting
  • Excellent communication skills

Nice to have:

Familiarity with API testing and SQL queries

We offer

  • Market-oriented content tested in hundreds of runs
  • Deep dive into your specialization and related emerging technologies
  • Hands-on learning through practical tasks and real project simulations
  • Regular guidance from technology mentors and your Resource Manager
  • AI tools to deliver a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Access to EPAM internal education resources for professional growth
  • Chance to join our team upon successful graduation

name: IT Service Desk Team Lead
description:
Responsibilities:

Organize and supervise the work of the Service Desk team (Level 1 and/or Level 2 support).

Assign tasks and monitor SLA compliance and incident priorities.

Escalate and resolve complex technical issues.

Ensure high-quality service delivery and monitor user satisfaction.

Work with ticketing systems ServiceNow.

Monitor ticket resolution, analyze recurring issues, and propose improvements.

Provide mentorship, coaching, and training for team members.

Evaluate team performance and support professional development.

Cross-Team Communication:

Coordinate with system administrators, developers, security teams, and other departments.

Escalate problems to the appropriate support levels as needed.

Documentation & Standards:

Maintain and update knowledge base articles, user guides.

Prepare regular KPI and SLA reports.

Drive initiatives to improve support quality and operational efficiency.

Participate in IT service implementation projects.

Administer user accounts (e.g., Active Directory, Microsoft 365).

Assist in audits and compliance with information security standards

Professional Requirements:
1. Education:
‚Ä¢ Higher education in a technical field (e.g., IT, computer science, engineering).
2. Work Experience:
‚Ä¢ At least 3 years of experience in a service desk or a similar role.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in managing a technical support team.
‚Ä¢ Experience with ticketing systems (e.g., Jira, ServiceNow).
3. Knowledge and Skills:
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of ITIL or similar IT service management frameworks.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of incident, problem, and change management processes.
‚Ä¢ Technical proficiency (operating systems configuration, network connections, software).
‚Ä¢ Ability to work with metrics and reporting (SLAs, KPIs).
4. Languages:
‚Ä¢ English, Russian

Personal Qualities:
1. Leadership Skills:
‚Ä¢ Ability to inspire and organize a team.
‚Ä¢ Skills in task delegation and time management.
2. Communication Skills:
‚Ä¢ Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to communicate effectively with users, the team, and management.
‚Ä¢ Conflict resolution abilities.
3. Organizational Skills:
‚Ä¢ Ability to prioritize tasks effectively and work in a multitasking environment.
4. Stress Resistance:
‚Ä¢ Capability to respond quickly to critical situations and make decisions under pressure.

Additional Preferences:
1. Certifications (ITIL, Microsoft, Cisco, CompTIA, or others relevant to the role).
2. Experience in implementing and optimizing service desk processes.
3. Knowledge of scripting or process automation is a plus.

name: Software Functional Testing Trainee
description:
EPAM Campus offers a free Software Functional Testing training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will explore various testing types, methods and approaches, master test planning, requirements analysis and creating effective checklists, as well as learn how to report test results.

You can progress through this self-paced program at your convenience, as all learning materials will be accessible anytime. On average, you will need ~ 10 weeks and ~ 20 hours of weekly engagement.

Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with software development & testing life cycles and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing basics (Test Artifacts, Test Methods, Types and Levels, Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Strong communication skills

Nice to have:

  • Understanding of programming basics, networks, API and databases

We offer

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Automated Testing in .NET Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in .NET training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in –°# and the .NET platform, as well as master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~ 2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of C# programming (Integers, Static Methods, Boolean and Logical Operators, Conditional Statements, Real Numbers, Exceptions, Iteration Statements)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Test Automation Engineer | Middle+
description:
Netcracker ‚Äî the people designing the future of tech

What‚Äôs the value of working with Netcracker?

  • Your contribution matters. Your expertise drives large-scale business transformations and helps design architectural solutions for millions of telecom customers in Japan, Belgium, the Netherlands, Germany, the UAE, and beyond ‚Äî at the intersection of cutting-edge technologies.
  • An engineering culture that values mentorship and a vibrant expert community. A professional environment where knowledge sharing thrives and depth, rigor, and technical mastery are valued.
  • Career growth in every direction. Switch projects, specialize, and expand your domain, or step into management.
  • Work smarter, not harder. We value outcomes over hours. We trust professionals and support flexibility.
  • Resilience & adaptability. 30+ years globally and 3.5 years in Kazakhstan. We progress even amid global economic challenges.
  • Flexibility & comfort. Modern offices in convenient locations, flexible schedules, and a build-your-own benefits package ‚Äî you choose what matters most.

As a Test Automation Engineer (Middle+) your main tasks will be:

¬∑ Test design and test documentation;
¬∑ Auto tests development;
¬∑ Participation in test tools development;
¬∑ Test data preparation and test execution (manually and by launching auto tests);
¬∑ Analysis of test results.

We are waiting for:
¬∑ Practical experience in cloud solution testing;
¬∑ Hands-on experience in Kubernetes (OpenShift);
¬∑ Hands-on experience with test automation tools such as Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, etc;
¬∑ Hands-on experience in Postman;
¬∑ Understanding of CI/CD principles;
¬∑ Background in test design and manual testing;
¬∑ Willingness for self-development in test automation area.

We offer:

  • Competitive salary;
  • Medical insurance, covering dental services;
  • More than 300 hard and soft-skills programs by the corporate career development center;
  • Open environment and encouraging knowledge sharing culture;
  • Free English courses and opportunity to practice foreign languages daily;
  • Flexible working hours.

name: Playable Ads Developer
description:
Are you passionate about your work and want to pursue your dreams?

Join the ZiMAD team, and let‚Äôs collaborate to create exceptional games together!

ZiMAD is a US mobile game publisher and developer that has been at the forefront of the gaming industry since 2009. We are a dynamic multinational team, speaking 15 languages and living in 63 cities across 17 countries. With an impressive portfolio of world-class free-to-play projects, including titles like Magic Jigsaw Puzzles, Puzzle Villa, Art of Puzzles, Dominoes, and many others, we constantly push boundaries and believe that games can be more than just entertainment.

We‚Äôve forged partnerships with internationally renowned IPs (like Disney, Nickelodeon, LIFE, Sony Pictures etc.) and strive to develop games that sharpen mental well-being and deliver remarkable user experiences.

We are looking for a Playable Ads Developer to join our team in creating interactive promotional content.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop HTML5 games from scratch and enhance existing projects

  • Update images and reconfigure levels

Candidate Requirements:

  • Proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript
  • Knowledge of PixiJS
  • Experience with the Webpack build system
  • Experience with version control systems (Git)
  • Understanding of client-side development and client-server interactions
  • General knowledge of Design Patterns
  • Experience applying OOP and MVC principles

  • Ability to understand and work with existing codebases

  • Basic knowledge of Adobe Photoshop for working with graphic sources

What we offer:

  • Opportunity to work for ZiMAD, a US company with a diverse portfolio of global free-to-play (F2P) projects with a multi-million monthly user base
  • Involvement in the entire product development cycle
  • Career growth prospects within an international company
  • Remote work opportunities
  • Flexible working schedule
  • Bonuses based on the achievement of KPIs and financial results of projects
  • Paid conferences, training (including language courses), and workshops

name: Technical Leader Java
description:
We are looking for a Java Technical Lead to ensure new functionality in accordance with guidelines and timeframes. In this role you will be responsible for leading technical project teams, developing Java applications and contributing to client pitches.

Requirements

  • 5+ years of experience in IT
  • Hands-on experience with modern Java technologies for server solutions (Kotlin, Java 8+), Spring Boot/Framework
  • Knowledge of RDBMS and ORM (Hibernate, JOOQ, MyBatis), NoSQL databases
  • Architectural knowledge of client-server system principles, microservices, practical skills for design patterns and OOP
  • Experience in setting up and supporting development processes (CI/CD, code review, static code analysis, automated testing)
  • Hands-on experience with cloud services (MS Azure, AWS, Google Cloud)
  • English skills should be sufficient for taking part in conversations on the technical aspects of projects

Nice to have

  • Experience with Frontend development (HTML 5, JavaScript / TypeScript, Angular / React or other)
  • Experience working with SCRUM
  • Experience in creating technical documentation

We offer:

  • Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
  • Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
  • Career development system with clear skill qualifications
  • Flexible working hours aligned to your schedule
  • Options to work remotely
  • Compensation of medical costs
  • English courses online
  • Corporate parties and events for employees and their children
  • Internal conferences, workshops and meetups for learning and experience sharing
  • Gym membership compensation, corporate sport competitions (cybersport included)
  • 5 days of paid sick leave per year with no obligation to submit a sick-leave certificate
key_skills: Java, ORM, RDBMS, NoSQL, Spring Boot, Kotlin, MS Azure

name: Senior QA Test Automation Engineer

Netcracker is a forward-looking, software technology company providing mission-critical solutions to communication service providers around the globe. Every year since our founding in 1993, we have demonstrated significant growth, strong profitability, and highly credible thought leadership. The reason we continue to thrive in today‚Äôs highly challenging and competitive market is simple: our ability to recruit and retain the best talent in the industry. If you‚Äôre ready to move your career forward and be recognized for the unique talent and skillset you bring, take a look at the opportunities below and apply for a position:

QA Test Automation Engineer

  • Participation in the processes of preparation and updating test environments;
  • Development and support of automation frameworks and related documentation;
  • Auto tests configuration, run and gathering test results, CI/CD processes configuration;
  • Participation on implementation and supporting test automation tools, QA processes and best-practices;

    Skills:
  • Experience in programming;
  • Java SE basics;
  • basic SQL (SQL operators, syntax and data types), xml;
  • Understanding of debug technics;
    Requirements:
  • English on high level to write and communicate with team & Customer;
  • Communicative, active, customer-facing;
  • Understanding or experience with any task management system (JIRA);

    We offer:
  • Opportunities for professional growth and career development;
  • Medical insurance for employees;
  • Sports activities and corporate events;
  • Friendly atmosphere;
  • Salary will be discussed individually with the successful candidate

name: Team Leader / Software Architect (Python, FastAPI, AI Integration)
description:
Core Responsibilities:

  • Lead the design and development of robust backend systems using FastAPI.
  • Define and maintain the technical architecture, ensuring scalability, performance, and maintainability.
  • Evaluate, select, and integrate AI models and APIs that best fit project requirements (e.g., LLMs, vision, NLP, or recommendation models).
  • Supervise and mentor a team of developers, setting coding standards and conducting technical reviews.
  • Collaborate AI providers and product teams to ensure smooth integration of intelligent features.
  • Drive best practices in API design, cloud deployment, security, and DevOps automation.
  • Stay up-to-date with emerging AI technologies and frameworks to guide architectural decisions.

Technical Requirements:

Core Development Skills:

  • Expert-level Python development (5+ years).
  • Deep experience with FastAPI (async programming, dependency injection, background tasks, middleware).
  • Familiarity with Pydantic, SQLAlchemy, and async frameworks.
  • Strong understanding of RESTful API and OpenAPI standards.

AI Integration & Utilization:

  • Proven experience integrating external AI models and APIs (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, Hugging Face, Cohere, Google Gemini, etc.).
  • Ability to evaluate and select appropriate AI models based on functional and business needs (e.g., text generation, summarization, image recognition, classification).
  • Experience orchestrating AI pipelines ‚Äî prompt engineering, context management, and model fallback strategies.
  • Understanding of AI service architectures ‚Äî latency, scalability, cost, and compliance considerations.
  • Familiarity with vector databases and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) concepts.
  • Comfortable working with AI SDKs, APIs, and webhooks.

Architecture & System Design:

  • Experience designing modular, scalable backend architectures.
  • Strong grasp of microservices, event-driven and API-first design patterns.
  • Experience with containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes).
  • Familiarity with caching, message brokers (Redis, RabbitMQ, Kafka), and database scaling.
  • Proficiency in both SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis) systems.

DevOps & Cloud:

  • Hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines and GitHub Actions.
  • Understanding of cloud environments (GCP).
  • Familiarity with Infrastructure as Code tools (Terraform, Ansible).
  • Knowledge of monitoring and observability tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK).

Leadership & Communication

  • 3+ years of experience leading software teams or technical projects.
  • Strong architectural vision ‚Äî ability to design and communicate high-level solutions.
  • Skilled at translating business goals into technical strategies.
  • Excellent interpersonal and mentoring skills.
  • Comfortable running code reviews, technical planning, and architecture discussions.
  • Experience working in Agile/Scrum environments.

Nice to have:

  • Hands-on experience integrating multiple AI vendors‚Äô APIs (e.g., OpenAI, Hugging Face, Replicate).
  • Experience with AI-based applications such as chatbots, document analyzers, or recommendation systems.
  • Awareness of AI-related legal and ethical considerations (data privacy, model bias, compliance).
  • Contributions to open-source Python/FastAPI or AI integration projects.

We can offer:

  • Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
  • Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
  • Career development system with clear skill qualifications
  • Flexible working hours aligned to your schedule
  • Options to work remotely
  • Compensation of medical costs
  • English courses online
  • Corporate parties and events for employees and their children
  • Internal conferences, workshops and meetups for learning and experience sharing
  • Gym membership compensation, corporate sport competitions (cybersport included)
  • 5 days of paid sick leave per year with no obligation to submit a sick-leave certificate
