name: Middle+/Senior Manual QA Engineer - CNP Processing (E-Commerce), Office-based only
Web Master / Website Developer
description:
The Web Master/Website Developer will be responsible for the maintenance and optimization of De Montfort University Kazakhstan's website and web applications. The role involves both technical and aesthetic aspects of the website, ensuring it is functional, user-friendly, and aligned with the university's branding guidelines.

Key Responsibilities:

Website Maintenance: Maintain and troubleshoot the university website and associated web applications.

Content Management: Work closely with the Marketing team to update content, ensuring accuracy and compliance with brand standards.

UI/UX Design: Collaborate with stakeholders to create intuitive, user-friendly interfaces.

SEO Optimization: Implement SEO best practices to improve website visibility and traffic.

Security: Implement and monitor website security measures to protect against unauthorized access, data breaches, and other cyber threats.

Performance Monitoring: Use various tools to monitor website uptime, speed, and functionality. Make necessary improvements for optimal performance.

Data Analysis: Use analytics tools to track website performance metrics and provide reports to senior management.

Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work in tandem with IT Services, Marketing, Admissions, and other departments to ensure a cohesive web strategy.

Vendor Management: Coordinate with third-party vendors for additional web services, if needed.

Professional Development: Keep up-to-date with the latest web development technologies and methodologies.

Qualifications:

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or related field.

Minimum of 2 years experience in web development and maintenance, preferably in an educational institution.

Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and CMS platforms like WordPress.

Experience with responsive design and mobile optimization.

Strong SEO and Google Analytics skills.

Familiarity with website security protocols.

Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.

Strong organizational and project management skills.

Ability to work well in a team and independently.

Compensation:

  • Competitive salary, commensurate with experience and qualifications.

name: Automated Testing in Java Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in Java training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in Java and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of Java programming (Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Arrays, Classes)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials

  • Technology mentors from around the globe

  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs

  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience

  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Software Functional Testing Trainee
description:
EPAM Campus offers a free Software Functional Testing training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will explore various testing types, methods and approaches, master test planning, requirements analysis and creating effective checklists, as well as learn how to report test results.

You can progress through this self-paced program at your convenience, as all learning materials will be accessible anytime. On average, you will need ~ 10 weeks and ~ 20 hours of weekly engagement.

Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with software development & testing life cycles and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing basics (Test Artifacts, Test Methods, Types and Levels, Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Strong communication skills

Nice to have:

  • Understanding of programming basics, networks, API and databases

We offer

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Automated Testing in .NET Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in .NET training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in –°# and the .NET platform, as well as master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~ 2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of C# programming (Integers, Static Methods, Boolean and Logical Operators, Conditional Statements, Real Numbers, Exceptions, Iteration Statements)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Automated Testing in JavaScript Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in JavaScript training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in JavaScript and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of JavaScript programming (Variables, Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Functions, Strings, Arrays)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Senior Data Integration Engineer
description:
We are seeking a Senior Data Integration Engineer with expertise in data management, integration, and cloud-based technologies.

This role requires a solution-oriented professional passionate about creating and delivering advanced data systems. If you excel in cloud infrastructures and value precision, we encourage you to apply!

This position offers remote setup with the flexibility to work from any location in Kazakhstan, whether it's your home or well-equipped offices in Astana, Almaty or Karaganda.

Responsibilities

  • Design Data Integration solutions leveraging classic, modern, or hybrid cloud data tools
  • Collaborate with product and engineering teams to define requirements, evaluate new features, and make architectural decisions
  • Address business challenges by developing technical solutions aligned with quality and technical standards
  • Perform code reviews and execute testing processes to ensure alignment with technical specifications
  • Deliver comprehensive documentation for architectural designs and technical implementations

Requirements

  • Advanced knowledge of Data Integration tools such as Azure Data Factory, AWS Glue, and GCP Dataflow
  • Background in working with relational databases and programming tools including SQL, Python, PySpark
  • Proficiency in managing cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP to build scalable data environments
  • Understanding of Data Security principles, modern Data Management practices, and CI/CD workflows
  • Expertise in methodologies for data modeling, including OLAP, OLTP, ETL, and Data Warehousing
  • Capability to articulate complex ideas effectively with proficiency in English

We offer

  • We connect like-minded people: :
    • Delivering innovative solutions to industry leaders, making a global impact
    • Enjoyable working environment, whether it is the vibrant office or the comfort of your own home
    • Opportunity to work abroad for up to two months per year
    • Relocation opportunities within our offices in 55+ countries
    • Corporate and social events
  • We invest in your growth:‚ÄØ :
    • Leadership development, career advising, soft skills and well-being programs
    • Certifications, including GCP, Azure and AWS
    • Unlimited access to LinkedIn Learning and Get Abstract
    • Free English classes with certified teachers
    • Discounts in local language schools, including online courses for the Kazakh language
  • We cover it all: :
    • Participation in the Employee Stock Purchase Plan
    • Monetary bonuses for engaging in the referral program
    • Medical & family care package
    • Six trust days per year (sick leave without a medical certificate)
    • Coverage of psychology sessions of your choice
    • Benefits package (sports activities, a variety of stores and services)

EPAM is a team of technologists and innovators united by a passion for technology. In Kazakhstan, we operate across all cities with offices in Astana, Almaty, and Karaganda and work with the world's leading companies from different industries. In 2023, EPAM received the Export Excellence Award at the esteemed Digital Bridge Awards, showcasing our commitment to excellence and innovation.

name: Senior Full-stack developer (Angular, C++)
description:
OnTarget Labs is a leading international software product development company.
We create next generation of world class product lines.
The company is looking for a Senior Full-stack developer (Angular, C++) to join our innovative product team as a full-time member working remotely.
Lots of opportunities for professional growth and business trips abroad are offered.
Join our friendly team of IT professionals now!

Product Description

A cloud-based platform for managing the full lifecycle of critical assets (supply and inventory, vehicles, equipment data, maintenance scheduling, parts inventory).
It streamlines workflows, improves accountability, and reduces costs for its clients.
The solution offers robust reporting features and customizability, helping organizations manage their budgets and make data-driven decisions.

Responsibilities

  • Development and maintenance of the enterprise web application

Requirements

  • 5+ years of experience with building enterprise web applications
  • Angular 20+, Angular Material
  • TypeScript, JavaScript
  • C++ 20+
  • Qt framework
  • SQL
  • XML
  • REST API
  • WebSocket
  • git
  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field
  • Strong communication skills in English

Nice to Have

  • Bootstrap, jQuery
  • Boost
  • Catch2, MS CppUnitTestFramework
  • Jasmine, Karma
  • SVN, TFS

We offer

  • Competitive salary to be defined upon the interview results
  • Full time REMOTE WORK

name: Software Functional Testing Intern
description:
EPAM Campus offers an intensive Software Functional Testing internship program that will equip you with the deep knowledge and hands-on experience needed to kickstart your career in tech. EPAM professionals will help you learn to conduct requirements analysis for real use cases, develop your skills in creating test artifacts for a specific project, as well as explore the basics of prompt engineering and AI tools for QA specialists.

This program will last ~2-4 months and require ~20-40 hours of weekly engagement. The more time you devote to learning, the faster you will complete it.

Upon its successful completion, we will consider you for open positions based on your demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with the software development & testing life cycle and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing theory‚ÄØ(Test Artifacts; Test Methods, Types and Levels; Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Experience with requirement analysis, test design and defect reporting
  • Excellent communication skills

Nice to have:

Familiarity with API testing and SQL queries

We offer

  • Market-oriented content tested in hundreds of runs
  • Deep dive into your specialization and related emerging technologies
  • Hands-on learning through practical tasks and real project simulations
  • Regular guidance from technology mentors and your Resource Manager
  • AI tools to deliver a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Access to EPAM internal education resources for professional growth
  • Chance to join our team upon successful graduation

name: Tech Lead, Platform Architecture (AWS)
description:
Investbanq is an AI-powered wealth operating system for family offices, asset managers and banks. We are empowering traditional financial institutions to rapidly transform into AI-driven WealthTech players, enabling them to effectively capitalize on the growing wealth transfer to affluent millennials and other digital natives across emerging Asia and MENA. We are scaling quickly across Asia and MENA and are assembling a high‚Äëcalibre engineering team to power our next phase of growth.

Why this role matters

As the Tech Lead for Platform Architecture, you will be the technical cornerstone of our engineering team. You will have the ultimate responsibility for the architectural vision, design, and implementation of our entire platform on AWS and other cloud platforms. This role requires a strategic thinker with deep technical expertise who can lead a talented team of frontend and backend engineers to build a secure, scalable, and low-latency system.

You will mentor engineers, drive technical strategy, and make critical architectural decisions that shape the future of our AI-driven WealthTech platform. If you have a proven record of building complex, cloud-native systems in high-stakes environments like FinTech and enjoy leading from the front in a fast-paced startup, you will thrive in this role.

Our technology stack

You will be expected to have mastery over the technologies our teams use daily, including:

  • Cloud platform ‚Äì hands-on, expert-level knowledge of AWS is essential.
  • Backend ‚Äì NestJS, Node.js (Node 20+), TypeScript.
  • Frontend ‚Äì ReactJS, NextJS, TypeScript.
  • APIs ‚Äì REST, GraphQL (Apollo), WebSockets/SSE.
  • Data & messaging ‚Äì PostgreSQL (TimescaleDB), Redis Cluster, AWS SQS, S3.
  • Infrastructure & DevOps ‚Äì AWS ECS (Fargate), Lambda, API Gateway, CloudFront, Terraform, GitLab CI/CD, Docker.
  • Security & auth ‚Äì AWS KMS, Cognito (OIDC), IAM best practices.

Responsibilities

  • Architectural ownership ‚Äì design, document, and lead the implementation of a robust, scalable, and secure cloud architecture on AWS for our entire platform.
  • Team leadership & mentorship ‚Äì lead and mentor a team of frontend and backend engineers, fostering a culture of technical excellence, collaboration, and innovation. Review code, guide architectural decisions, and raise the engineering bar for the entire team.
  • System design ‚Äì architect end-to-end solutions, from SSR-optimized frontends to event-driven microservices, ensuring high performance and resilience.
  • DevOps & automation ‚Äì champion the "everything-as-code" philosophy. Oversee and enhance our CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure-as-code (Terraform), and deployment strategies on AWS ECS and Lambda.
  • FinTech & security ‚Äì implement and enforce enterprise-grade security and compliance standards suitable for the financial industry (e.g., SOC 2, ISO 27001). Design for data security using patterns like envelope encryption and least-privilege IAM.
  • Cross-functional collaboration ‚Äì work closely with product, design, and QA teams to translate complex business requirements into scalable technical solutions.

Requirements

Must-have

  • Experience ‚Äì 7+ years in software engineering with a proven track record of at least 3 years in a technical leadership or architectural role, ideally within a startup or FinTech environment.
  • Proven record ‚Äì demonstrable experience architecting, building, and deploying complex, scalable systems on AWS. A portfolio or detailed case studies of past projects is highly desirable.
  • AWS expertise ‚Äì expert-level, hands-on experience with core AWS services including ECS, Lambda, API Gateway, SQS, S3, KMS, Cognito, and PostgreSQL/RDS.
  • Full-stack acumen ‚Äì deep understanding of both modern backend (Node.js, NestJS) and frontend (React, Next.js) frameworks and the patterns to integrate them effectively.
  • Infrastructure as code ‚Äì strong proficiency with Terraform and Docker in a production environment.
  • Leadership ‚Äì exceptional ability to mentor engineers, drive technical discussions, and communicate complex architectural concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Communication ‚Äì clear written and verbal English communication skills.

Nice-to-have

  • Direct experience in FinTech, trading platforms, or high-compliance domains.
  • Familiarity with time-series databases (e.g., TimescaleDB) and financial data visualization libraries (e.g., TradingView).
  • Experience building and maintaining design systems and component libraries (Storybook, Figma tokens).
  • Knowledge of observability stacks (OpenTelemetry, Prometheus, Grafana).
  • Active contributions to open-source software, tech blogs, or speaking engagements.

Working conditions

  • hybrid work environment: 3 days in the office, 2 days remote

  • modern office location in Almaty

  • official employment in compliance with AIFC Employment Regulations

  • opportunities for professional growth and career progression

  • multilingual working environment

  • exposure to cutting-edge AI-driven WealthTech solutions

  • a collaborative and inclusive corporate culture that values innovation and initiative

  • periodic remote (e.g., during winter) from year 2

  • ESOP participation from year 2

name: GO Trainee
description:
International company Andersen, one of the leaders in the outsource production market, is recruiting for GO traineeship with further employment in Kazakhstan (in the office: Almaty or Kazakhstan remote).

Andersen Company is interested in the rapid professional development of employees and improvement of their skills, is ready to invest funds and time. Therefore, our competitive advantage is considered to be rapid growth, in terms of salaries, among other things.

Requirements:

  • Intermediate or higher level of English (verbal communication);
  • strong theoretical knowledge of Go;
  • basic data structures knowledge;
  • OOP principles understanding;
  • knowledge of relational databases;
  • understanding of the importance of testing and experience in unit tests writing;
  • will be a plus: Intermediate or higher level of German.

Conditions:

  • practice on a training project under the guidance of experienced tutors;
  • control of the trainee's knowledge mastery and feedback;
  • office-based or remote format of training;
  • corporate English language courses at the office or online;
  • access to the corporate internal training programme (own educational platform);
  • participation in the company's vibrant corporate life.

An Andersen trainee can confidently count on:

  • high professionalism of mentors;
  • careful and attentive attitude during training;
  • assistance and support during the training process and when entering a commercial project afterwards;
  • guaranteed employment upon successful completion of training.

Andersen is a great opportunity to start and grow in IT!

name: AI Developer (Streamlit)
description:
Andersen is looking for an AI Developer for a project with a global energy company. The role involves creating AI solutions for document processing to support digital transformation and improve efficiency.

The customer is a global energy technology company with a large international footprint, delivering solutions for power generation, transmission, and industrial electrification. Known for its focus on sustainability and innovation, the organization invests heavily in research and development to support decarbonization efforts, enhance energy reliability, and advance modern renewable and digital energy technologies.

The project is focused on building an AI-powered document ingestion and content-extraction solution as part of a broader digital transformation initiative. It aims to automate how large volumes of documents are processed, using modern AI technologies to improve efficiency, accuracy, and decision-making across the organization.

Responsibilities:

  • Designing and implementing RAG pipelines to enhance LLM performance, ensuring accurate and context-aware responses.
  • Developing AI-powered applications in Python, leveraging frameworks such as LangChain, LlamaIndex, and related orchestration tools.
  • Building interactive prototypes and dashboards using Streamlit to demonstrate and validate AI workflows.
  • Applying NLP techniques for text extraction, classification, and semantic search across diverse document formats.
  • Integrating OCR and VLM solutions (e.g., Unstructured.io, Azure Document Intelligence, AWS Textract) into scalable data processing pipelines.
  • Managing cloud-native workflows on AWS, including deployment, monitoring, and optimization of AI services.

Must-haves:

  • Hands-on Python development experience, with a strong focus on building robust, scalable systems for 5+ years.
  • Essential experience with streamlit.
  • Proficient with NLP.
  • Experience with AWS.
  • Familiar with OCR, VLMs, data extraction/parsing libraries like unstructured, llamaindex etc and vector/nosql databases like OpenSearch or MongoDb.
  • Proficiency in building RAG pipelines and experience with LLM.
  • Clear written and verbal communication skills to collaborate across teams and document complex systems.
  • Level of English ‚Äì from Upper-Intermediate and above.

Reasons why this job would be interesting to you:

  • Experience in teamwork with leaders in FinTech, Healthcare, Retail, Telecom, and others. Andersen cooperates with such businesses as Samsung, Siemens, Johnson & Johnson, BNP Paribas, Ryanair, Mercedes, TUI, Verivox, Allianz, T-Systems, etc.
  • The opportunity to change the project and/or develop expertise in an interesting business domain.
  • Job conditions ‚Äì you can work both fully remotely and from the office or can choose a hybrid variant.
  • Guarantee of professional, financial, and career growth! The company has introduced systems of mentoring and adaptation for each new employee.
  • The opportunity to earn additional up to 1,000 EUR per month by participating in the company's activities.
  • Access to the corporate training portal, where the entire knowledge base of the company is collected and which is constantly updated.
  • Bright corporate life (parties / pizza days / PlayStation / fruits / coffee / snacks / movies).
  • Certification compensation (AWS, PMP, etc).
  • Referral program.
  • English courses.
  • Private health insurance and compensation for sports activities.

Your personal data is protected in accordance with GDPR regulations. Learn more: https://andersenlab.com/privacy-policy

name: FullStack Engineer (React+ Node.js)
description:
Andersen is hiring a FullStack Engineer (React+ Node.js) to help enhance and scale a global personalized photo product platform by building performant, maintainable full-stack solutions.

The customer is a long-standing provider of personalized photo products operating across several international markets. The organization is known for its high quality standards, strong data protection practices, and commitment to sustainability. Its products regularly receive industry recognition, supporting its reputation as a reliable and customer-focused producer.

The project is centered on enhancing and expanding the company‚Äôs digital product ecosystem, with a strong focus on performance, scalability, and long-term maintainability. The team is responsible for developing robust full-stack solutions that improve user experience and strengthen the overall technical foundation of the platform.

Responsibilities:

  • Designing, developing, and technically enhancing complex frontend modules and interfaces.
  • Building and maintaining reusable component libraries and design systems for consistent user experiences.
  • Managing the integration of modern interfaces and services into existing backend structures.
  • Ensuring performance, stability, and consistency across various platforms and devices.
  • Establishing automated tests as an integral part of the development process.
  • Fostering technical excellence through code reviews, architectural feedback, and standardization of best practices.
  • Collaborating closely with product, design, QA, backend, and DevOps teams to ensure a consistent overall approach.
  • Evaluating new technologies, frameworks, and tools to continuously improve development processes.

Must-haves:

  • Experience as Full-Stack Engineer experience for 4+ years.
  • Excellent knowledge of modern frontend technologies such as React, TypeScript, CSS frameworks and backend technologies such as Node.js or –°#.
  • Solid experience in building and maintaining design systems and component libraries.
  • Solid understanding of API design and integration (REST, GraphQL).
  • Experience in performance optimization and implementing scalable architectures.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD workflows and cloud deployment.
  • Strong quality awareness, analytical thinking, and a keen sense of UX and product quality.
  • Level of German ‚Äì from Intermediate+ and above.
  • Level of English ‚Äì from Intermediate+ and above.

Nice-to-haves:

  • University degree, university of applied sciences degree, ETH degree, or n equivalent qualification with relevant professional experience.
  • Knowledge of cross-platform frameworks (e.g., Capacitor).

Reasons why this job would be interesting to you:

  • Experience in teamwork with leaders in FinTech, Healthcare, Retail, Telecom, and others. Andersen cooperates with such businesses as Samsung, Siemens, Johnson & Johnson, BNP Paribas, Ryanair, Mercedes, TUI, Verivox, Allianz, T-Systems, etc.
  • The opportunity to change the project and/or develop expertise in an interesting business domain.
  • Job conditions ‚Äì you can work both fully remotely and from the office or can choose a hybrid variant.
  • Guarantee of professional, financial, and career growth! The company has introduced systems of mentoring and adaptation for each new employee.
  • The opportunity to earn additional up to 1,000 USD per month by participating in the company's activities.
  • Access to the corporate training portal, where the entire knowledge base of the company is collected and which is constantly updated.
  • Bright corporate life (parties / pizza days / PlayStation / fruits / coffee / snacks / movies).
  • Certification compensation (AWS, PMP, etc).
  • Referral program.
  • English courses.
  • Private health insurance and compensation for sports activities.

name: Software Functional Testing Trainee
description:
EPAM Campus offers a free Software Functional Testing training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will explore various testing types, methods and approaches, master test planning, requirements analysis and creating effective checklists, as well as learn how to report test results.

You can progress through this self-paced program at your convenience, as all learning materials will be accessible anytime. On average, you will need ~ 10 weeks and ~ 20 hours of weekly engagement.

Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with software development & testing life cycles and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing basics (Test Artifacts, Test Methods, Types and Levels, Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Strong communication skills

Nice to have:

  • Understanding of programming basics, networks, API and databases

We offer

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: IT Systems Administrator (Mid-Level)
description:
What you‚Äôll do

  • Administer Microsoft 365/Entra ID (Azure AD), Exchange Online, Intune/MDM (users, groups, licenses, security, device compliance).
  • Manage Windows Server and Active Directory (GPO, DNS, DHCP, file/print, permissions).
  • Provide L1/L2 support and troubleshoot remotely and on-site (hardware/software, printers, VPN, email, endpoints).
  • Handle networking (LAN/WAN):VLANs, Wi-Fi, VPN, and firewall rule requests.
  • Maintain endpoint builds, patching, and imaging; document runbooks and SOPs.
  • Monitor systems, respond to incidents, and drive root-cause fixes.
  • Collaborate with vendors; prepare clear incident and change records (ITIL-lite).

What you‚Äôll need

  • 3‚Äì4 years in IT support/systems administration.
  • Strong troubleshooting across Windows 10/11 and Windows Server.
  • Active Directory admin (users, groups, OU/GPO, join/trust basics).
  • Microsoft 365 admin (mailboxes, licenses, transport basics, MFA/SSO).
  • Networking fundamentals: TCP/IP, DHCP/DNS, VLANs, site-to-site/client VPN.
  • Experience supporting hardware & software issues end-to-end.
  • Comfortable with remote tools (RDP, AnyDesk, etc.) and ticketing systems.
  • Basic Linux CLI (e.g., ls, cat, tail, systemctl, df -h).
  • Bonus: PowerShell basics for admin tasks.

Nice to have (plus points)

  • Azure (Entra ID Connect, Conditional Access), Intune/Autopilot.
  • ITIL Foundation, MS (MD-102/Server), CCNA or equivalent.

name: Automated Testing in Java Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in Java training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in Java and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of Java programming (Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Arrays, Classes)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan

  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials

  • Technology mentors from around the globe

  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs

  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience

  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages

name: Software Functional Testing Intern
description:
EPAM Campus offers an intensive Software Functional Testing internship program that will equip you with the deep knowledge and hands-on experience needed to kickstart your career in tech. EPAM professionals will help you learn to conduct requirements analysis for real use cases, develop your skills in creating test artifacts for a specific project, as well as explore the basics of prompt engineering and AI tools for QA specialists.

This program will last ~2-4 months and require ~20-40 hours of weekly engagement. The more time you devote to learning, the faster you will complete it.

Upon its successful completion, we will consider you for open positions based on your demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.

Requirements

  • English level from B1 (Intermediate)‚ÄØand higher
  • Familiarity with the software development & testing life cycle and Agile frameworks
  • Solid knowledge of functional testing theory‚ÄØ(Test Artifacts; Test Methods, Types and Levels; Main Testing Terms; Test Planning and Analysis; Test Documentation; Test Design Techniques; Defect and Results Reporting)
  • Experience with requirement analysis, test design and defect reporting
  • Excellent communication skills

Nice to have:

Familiarity with API testing and SQL queries

We offer

  • Market-oriented content tested in hundreds of runs
  • Deep dive into your specialization and related emerging technologies
  • Hands-on learning through practical tasks and real project simulations
  • Regular guidance from technology mentors and your Resource Manager
  • AI tools to deliver a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Access to EPAM internal education resources for professional growth
  • Chance to join our team upon successful graduation

name: Automated Testing in JavaScript Trainee
description:
Details

EPAM Campus offers a free Automated Testing in JavaScript training program to help you gain market-oriented hard and soft skills alongside IT professionals. In this intensive course, you will learn core software development and testing tools, advance your proficiency in JavaScript and master modern frameworks for test automation.

This program will last ~2.5 months and require ~20 hours of weekly engagement. Completing it won't guarantee a job, but it will lay a solid foundation to enter the profession confidently, either at our company or in the broader IT market.

Requirements

  • English level of B1 (Intermediate) and higher
  • Basic knowledge of JavaScript programming (Variables, Data Types, Conditions and Loops, Functions, Strings, Arrays)
  • Familiarity with testing theory (Static & Dynamic Testing, Requirement Analysis, Software Testing Methods & Levels, Testing Pyramid, Functional & Non-Functional Testing Types, Test Planning, Checklists, Test Cases & Suites, Defects, Test Result Reports)
  • Understanding of test automation goals
  • Basic knowledge of version control with Git
  • Ability to work with self-study materials and meet deadlines

We offer

  • Remote learning from any location in Kazakhstan
  • Free-of-charge training program and educational materials
  • Technology mentors from around the globe
  • Market-oriented content tested in numerous runs
  • AI tools for delivering a cutting-edge learning experience
  • Opportunity to join more advanced training stages
